Ndingotsuka mtimano M’mwazi wa Ambuye ’Nu.

4. Mmene ndidzaimatu Pa ciweruzopo,
Podzapulumukatu, Ndidzamatama Yesuyo.

title: 119 - Ndiona Mwazi Wacewo
content:
119 - Ndiona Mwazi Wacewo

THE CLEANSING WAVE

1. Ndiona mwazi wacewo, Kasupe wodzaza;
Ambuye Yesu, Mp’lumutsi, Aloza balalo.

CHORUS:
Ndiona mwazi wacewo, Unditsuka ’ne mtimamo!
Nditama Mbuye Yesuyo, Ndiyere Mtima mwangamo.

2. Ndibadwa mwa tsopanotu, Za kale zafanso;
Ndikhala moyo mwa Yesu, Ndasamba m’mwazi ’ce.

3. Ndiyenda m’nyali ya mmwamba, Kupewa chimolo;
Ambuye Yesu alowa, Mu Mtima wangamo.

4. Cisomo cozizwitsatu Kusamba mwaziwo;
Ambuye wopacikwayo, Ndimdziwa yekhayo.

title: 120 - Atate, Ndziperekatu
content:
120 - Atate, Ndziperekatu

I DO BELIEVE

1. Atate, ndziperekatu, Palibe winanso,
Popanda Inu, Mbuyanga, Ndidzanka kutiko?

CHORUS:
Eh! Ndikulupira ’Ye, wondifera ine.
Anapereka mwazi ’ce, Kupulumutsa ’ne.

2. Ndikhulupira Mwanayo, Ndifuna mphamvu ’ce;
Zoipa zanga zonsezo, Mzicotse Inutu.

3. Kwa Inu, Mbuye, mwini wa Chikhulupiroco,
Mndipatse mphatso yanuyo, Ndingafe m’mtimanga.

title: 121 - Ndiyimbatu Za Yesu
content:
121 - Ndiyimbatu Za Yesu

I WLL SING OF JESUS’ LOVE

1. Ndi’mbatu za Yesuyo, Yemwe anaconda ’ne;
Anacoka m’mwambamo, Anafa mtandapo.

CHORUS:
Ndi’mbatu za Yesuyo, Kuyamika kosatha;
Nadza Kundifera ’ne, Ndi’mbabe cikondico.

2. Yesu analira ’ne Mu Getsemane kale;
Napemphera inedi, Ndisanamdziwetu.

3. Anthu ndi angelowo sangazindikiretu,
M’mene chimo langali liyeretsedwadi.

4. Sinacite kanthu bi Kulipira cikondi;
Ndingopatsa mtimanga, Ndimkonda konseko.

title: 122 - Ndidze Pafupi Ndi Inu
content:
122 - Ndidze Pafupi Ndi Inu

NEARER, STILL NEARER

1. Ndidze pafupi ndi Inutu, Yesu, Mombolo wopambana ’Nu;
Inu mndisunge mmnaja mwanu, Inu mndibise pa ngaka yanu,
Inu mndibise pa ngaka yanu.

2. Ndidza pafupi ndekha, Kanthu ndiribe kopatsa Yesu;
Mtima woipa ndipatsa ’Nu, Munditsuketu ndi mwazi wanu,
Munditsuketu ndi mwazi wanu.

3. Ndidza pafupi, ndine wanu, Ine ndisiya zoipa zonse;
Zonse zonyada za dzikoli, Koma mndipatse Ambuye Yesu,
Koma mndipatse Ambuye.

4. Ndidza pafupi ndinu, Mbuye, Mpaka kumwamba ndidzalowatu,
Nthawi zosatha n’dzakhalabe, Pafupifupi ndi Mp’lumutsiyo,
Pafupifupi ndi Mp’lumutsiyo.

title: 123 - Dzina Lopambana Mmwamba
content:
123 - Dzina Lopambana Mmwamba

HOLIEST NAME

1. Dzina lopambana m’mwamba, Ndi pa dzilo lonselo,
Lomwe ’Tate anamucha Mwana wace mmodziyo.

CHORUS:
Dzina loyeratu (loyera), Dzina lofatsanso (lofatsa),
Lomwe nalinena angelowo.
Pa utsiku uja (dzinalo), Dzina lokomatu (dzinalo),
Ndilo la Ambuye Yesu.

2. Dzinalo lipatsa dalo, Ndi cimwemwe mtimanga,
Ndidzauza anthu ena Za cokoma caceco.

3. Moyo wanga udzayimba Za cikondi caceco;
Ndidzatamandabe dzina, Lopambana onsewo.

title: 124 - Ndikweze Yesu Yekha
content:
124 - Ndikweze Yesu Yekha

NOT I, BUT CHRIST

1. Ndikweze yesu yekha m’zinthu zonse;
Amveke, aoneke yekhayo;
Mu ntchito, m’maganizo ndipo m’mau
Ambuye aoneke yekhayo.

2. Ndi Yesu atonthoza akulira
Yekhayo angacotse msoziwo;
Yekhayo angatule akatundu
Yekhayo angacotse manthawo.

3. Ndileke mau onse ena cabe,
Ndileke zakupusa zangazi
Ndikweze Yesu ndisanyade konse,
Ndisadzitame koma Iyeyo.

4. Ndi Kristu amapatsa ’ne zosowa
Ndi yekha amapatas mphamvunso
Yekhayo m’thupi , m’moyo, ndi mu mzimu
Ndi Kristu yekha nthawi zonsezo.

title: 125 - Muli Dzuwa M’phiri Muja
content:
125 - Muli Dzuwa M’phiri Muja

SUNLIGHT IN THE HEART

1. Muli dzuwa m’phiri muja, Muli dzuwa m’nyanjamo;
K’wala kwace kumagwera Pa maudzu ponsepo;
Koma dzuwa lopambana Liri m’tima mwangamu;
Ka’mba komwe mukhalitsa, Kuli dzuwa lowala.

CHORUS:
Muli dzuwa lakuwalitsa! Muli dzulwa m’timanga.
Yesu adzacotsa mdima, Muli dzuwa m’timanga.

2. Ndisiya ’ne nsoni zanga Ndi zobvala za nsanza;
Mundibvekatu zoyera, Ndiyamika m’mtimamo’
Kuli malo a ulemu Munandikonzera ’ne;
Mtima wanga ufunako, Ndizatsa Inutu.

3. Inu, Yesu, Mwandigula, Ndine wanu konseko,
Munayatsa nyali yanga, Iwalire Inuyo;
Kuli malo a ulemu Munandikonzera ’ne,
Mtima wanga ufunako, Ndidzatsa Inuyo.

title: 126 - Iripo Nyimbo Ndikonda
content:
126 - Iripo Nyimbo Ndikonda

SINCE I HAVE BEEN REDEEMED

1. Iripo nyimbo ndikonda Kuyimba ineyo,
Ya Yesu Mbuye wangayo, C’omboledwere ’ne.

CHORUS:
Ntaomboledwa ’ne, Ndzalemekezatu dzina la Ambuyeyo.
Ntaomboledwa ’ne, Ndidzalemekeza dzinalo.

2. Wakukwanitsa mtimanga ndi Yesu Kristuyo;
Ndicita cifuniro ’ce, C’omboledwere ’ne.

3. Iripo mboni yangayo, Comboledwere ’ne.
Yocotsa nkhawa, manthanso, Comboledwere ’ne.

4. Alipo malo angawo, Wandikonzera ’Ye.
Kumene ndidzakhalako, Ntaomboledwa ’ne.

title: 127 - Mulungu Asamalabe
content:
127 - Mulungu Asamalabe

HE LOVES ME, TOO

1. Mulungu asamalabe Mbalame zonsezo;
Ngatitu azikondadi, Akonda inenso.

CHORUS:
Andiknda, andikonda, Akonda inenso;
Akonda zinthu zonsezo, Akonda inenso.

 2. Maluwa mthengo monsemo Apanga Mbuyeyo;
Ngatitu awakondadi, Akonda inenso.

3. Mulungu, mlengi wathuyo Apanga zonsezo;
Samaiwala ana ’ce, Aknda onsewo.

title: 128 - Nthawi Ya Pemphero
content:
128 - Nthawi Ya Pemphero

BLESSED HOUR OF PRAYER

1. Nthawi ya pempheroyo, powerama ife,
Tisonkhana kwa Yesu, Ambuyathuyo;
Tikakhulupiratu adzatibisanso,
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu.

CHORUS:
Ndi yokomadi, nthawi ya pempho,
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu

2. Nthawi ya pempheroyo, Yesu ali mfupi
Ndi cifundo caceco atimvera ’fe.
Atiuza nkhawazo, tizataye kwa ’Ye,
Tidzapeza mpumulo, tikapempheratu.

3. Nthawi ya pempheroyo, akuyesedwawo
Amatula kwa Yesu zisoni zawo;
Yesu wacifundoyo amazicotsatu,
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu.

4. Nthawi ya pempheroyo tikhulupiranso
Kuti zomwe tisowa tilandiradi;
Tikakhulupiradi nkhawa zicokanso;
Tidzapeza mpumulo tikapempheratu

title: 129 - Yesu Mnalonjeza
content:
129 - Yesu Mnalonjeza

JESUS, COME AND BLESS US

1. Yesu mnalonjeza, Kuti komwetu
Asonkhana ’tatu, Muli komweko;
Tikukhulupira, Tigwadira ’Nu;
Yesu, mtidalitse, Mkhale nafetu

CHORUS:
Yesu, mtidalitse Popemphera ’fe;
Yesu, mtidaliste, Mkhale mfupimo.

2. Mnasonkhana nafe Nthawi zonsezo,
Tikusowaninso Mpaka mapeto;
;Dzani, Mpulumutsi, Mtidalitsenso;
Mutimvere ife, Tikupempha ’Nu.

3. Yesu, mtithangate Poyimbira ’Nu,
Pempho liri lonse Mlilandiretu;
Cikh’lupiro cathu Mcikulitsenso;
Mdzaze ’fe cikondi, Ndi ku’nikanso.

title: 130 - Ndine Wanuyo
content:
130 - Ndine Wanuyo

I AM THINE, O LORD

1. Ndine wanuyo, ndamva mauwo, A cikondi canuco;
Mundikoketu mfupi ndinuyo, Mwa cikhulupiroco.

CHORUS:
Mndisendeze (mfupi), mfupi mbuyanga, Ndi pa mtanda wanuwo;
Mndisendeze mfupi, Mbuye wanga ’Nu, Ndi pa mwazi wanuwo.

2. M’nchito yanu mndipatulire ’ne, Mwa cisomo canuco;
Moyo wangawo uyang’ane ’Nu, Ndicitetu zanuzo.

3. Ndikondwera ’ne pakupitatu, Kugwadira Mbuyeyo;
Pakunenenatu naye mtserimo, Monga bwenzi langalo.

4. Sindidziwatu za cikondico, Mpaka n’dzanke tsidyalo;
Sindifikira za cimwemweco, Mpaka n’dzanke kwanuko.

title: 131 - Inetu Ndifunadi
content:
131 - Inetu Ndifunadi

1. Inetu ndifunadi Kufanana ndi Yesu,
Andidzaze mtimamo Ndi kufatsa kwaceko;
Ndidziyenda monga ’Ye mdziko la zoipali;
Ndine wosaukadi, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.

2. Ngati amva kwangwala, Nayang’ana mphetazo,
Nasamala zonsezo, Ndithu andimveranso
Adzandiphunzitsa ’ne, Nakhulukira ’ne;
Ndikhaletu wagwiro, Yesu mkhale mtimanga.

3. Popemphera ndikhale Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo;
Ndipumule mwa Iye, Andimwetse madziwo.

title: 132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu
content:
132 - Yesu, Mundisungetu

NEAR THE CROSS

1. Yesu, mundisungetu, Mfupi mtanda wina
Ndipezemo kasupe wondiciza Mtima.

CHORUS:
Mtandawo, mtandawo, Nditamanda mtanda,
Mpaka moyo wangawo Udzapume mmwamba.

2. Nsisi zandipezanso, Pomwe pali mtanda.
Ee! Pa mtanda nthandayo Indiunikira.

3. Pa mtandapo ndiona Mwana wa Mulungu.
Mndithandize, Mbuyanga, Kuyendabe nanu.

4. Pa mtandapo ndzalinda, Ndikuyembekeza,
Mpaka ndidzfika ku Dziko la kumwamba.

title: 133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu
content:
133 - Ndiyende Nanu Mulungu

WALKING WITH GOD

1. Ndiyende nanu Mlungu ’Nu, Mongatu Enoke kalelo;
Mndigwire dzanja langalo, Mulankhule ndi inenso;
Ngakhale sindionatu, Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga

2. Sin’funa Kwenda ndekhatu, Namondwe amaombabe;
Misampha indicera ’ne, Adani andizinganso;
Mutontholetse njanjayo, Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.

3. Mukandigwira dzanjali, Nditayatu za dzikoli;
Ndzayenda molimbikatu, Ndzasenza mtanda wangawao;
Mpakatu ndzanke m’mwambamo, Ndiyende ndinu, Mbuyanga.

title: 134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse
content:
134 - Ndi Mtima Wanga Wonse

WONDERFUL LOVE OF JESUS

1. Ndi Mtima wanga wonsewo, Ndikweza mau kwanuko,
Ndiyimbe bwanji cikondi Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye?

CHORUS:
Cikonditu cozizwaco, Cikondi ca Yesuyo;
Cikonditu cozizwaco, Cikondi ca Yesuyo.

2. Cipatsa ’ne mtenderewo, Ciunikira m’njirayo,
Cicotsa bvuto Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye.

3. Ciyembekezo cangaco Conditurutsa m’macimo;
Pakufa ndi’imba cikondi Cozizwitsa ca Yesu Mbuye.

title: 135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga
content:
135 - Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga

I LOVE THEE BETTER, LORD

1. Ndikonda Inu, Mbuyanga, Koposa zonsezo;
Cifukwa mwandipatsatu Mtendere wanuwo

CHORUS:
Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo), Za nsisi zacezo;
Sanazinene zonsezo (zonsezo) Watsuka inenso.

2. Mukhala mfupi ndineyo, Koposa onsewo;
Ndikonda kuganiza ’Nu Koposa zinazo.

3. Mwandikondwetsa, Mbuyanga, Ndisangalaladi;
Popanda nsisi zanuzo Sindingakondwei.

4. Ambuye wanga, Yesuyo, Mkayenda nanedi,
Masiku onse pansipo Ndidzakondweradi.

title: 136 - Akan’stogoza Ndinkako
content:
136 - Akan’stogoza Ndinkako

I REMEMBER CALVARY

1. Akan’stogoza ndinkako, Ndikulupira Mbuyeyo;
Ndikumbukira kutitu Anandifera pa mtanda.

CHORUS:
Yesu anditsogozatu Ulendo wanga wonsewo.
Bwenzi loona ndiyeyo Ndkumbukira Mtandawo

2. Ndinkonda mau acewo, Anditsogoze Mbuyeyo;
Kufuna kwace ndicite, Anandifera pa mtanda.

3. Ndzapita osaopai, Akhale nane Yesuyo.
Pa tsiku lina n’dzaona Yesu tsamwali wa mtanda.

title: 137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu
content:
137 - Dziko Ai, Koma Yesu

GIVE ME JESUS

1. Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Dziko ndi lacabetu;
Nsisi zace zikhalitsa Nthawi zonse yemweyo.

CHORUS:
Nsisi zace n’zazikuru, Ndi cikondi cacenso;
Ciombolo cozizwitsa, Moyotu wosathawo!

2. Dziko ai, koma Yesu, Wondisangalatsa ’ne;
Iye andiyang’anira, Nkana m’bvuto ndi’mbabe.

3. Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Ndiyang’ane Iyeyo;
Pa ulendo wanga wonse, Andiunikira ’ne.

4. Dziko ai, Koma Yesu, Mtandawo ndigwiradi;
Mpakatu maso ndi maso, Ndidzamone Mbuyeyo.

title: 138 - Ndipereka Moyowu
content:
138 - Ndipereka Moyowu

ENTIRE CONSECRATION

1. Ndipereka moyowu Kwa Ambuye wanga ’Nu;
Manjawa acitetu Cifuniro canuco.

CHORUS:
Munditsuke ine Mtima mbu (e, Ine mbu)
M’mwazi wa Ambuye Yesuyo (E, Yesuyo),
Kwanu Mbuyanga ndiziperekadi,
Kwanu nthawi zonsezo.

2. Ndipereka myendoyi, Ikhaletu yanuyo;
Mau ayimbirenso Inu Mfumu yangayo.

3. Ndipereka milomo, Inetu mauwo;
Ndipereka cumaco, Sindimana kanthui.

4. ndipereka nsikuzo, Kuti ndiyamike ’Nu;
Ndipereka nzeruzo Kucitatu ntchitoyo.

5. Cifuniro cangaco Cikhaletu canunso;
Ndipereka mtimanga, Ukhaletu wanunso.

6. Ndipereka cikondi Pa mapazi anuwo;
Munditenge ndensene, Ndikhaletu wanuyo.

title: 139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo
content:
139 - Tsamwali Ndamkumanayo

I’VE FOUND A FRIEND

1. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandikonda kale;
Kukonda kwandigwirako, M’kukondamo nditsale.
Ku Mtima kundimangako, Kosamasuka konse,
Ambuye ndine wanuyo, Ku nthawi nthawi zonse.

2. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Anandifera yekha;
Anadipatsa moyowao, Ndatenga ine ndekha;
Zimene ndiri nazozi, Za Yesu, mwini zonse
Ndi moyo wanga wonse ndi Wacenso nthawi zonse.

3. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Ndapeza mphamvu zanga,
Pakundisunga inemo, Ndiyende m’njira mwanga;
Zolemera zoti mbe Zilimbitsa monse,
Ndalema kuno komweko, Nkupuma nthawi zonse.

4. Tsamwali ndamkumanayo, Wokoma Mtima wace,
Wotsogolera nzeruzo, Zisunga m’njira mwace;
Kwa Iye wondikondako, Sandicotsamo konse,
Pa moyo, imfa, nayeyo, Ndiripo nthawi zonse.

title: 140 - Mau A Yesu
content:
140 - Mau A Yesu

THE VOICE OF JESUS

1. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Idza udzapume
Wolema’we ndi zoipa, Tsamira pa Ine.
Ndinadza kwa Yesu momwe ndinali  wolema;
Mwa iye ndinapumula, Nandikondweretsa.

2. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndipatsa kolere
Madzi a moyo wosatha, Idza udzamwetu
Ndinadza kwa Yesu ndi ’mwa Mu mtsinje wamoyo
Ndipo ndinatsitsimuka, Ndikhala mwa Iye.

3. Ndinamva Yesu akuti, Ndine kuunika;
Yang’ananitsa kwa ine, Ndipo udzakondwa.
Ndinayang’ana kwa Yesu, Mwa Iye ndiwala;
Ndidzayendabe m’ku’nika, Mpaka kumwambako.

title: 141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu
content:
141 - Ndikhaletu Wanu

WHOLLY THINE

1. Ndikhaletu wanu, Mbuyanga; Konseko, konseko,
E! kufuna ndicite, Mndithandizetu.

CHORUS:
Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu, Mbuyana
Wanutu (Mbuye), wanutu (Mbuye), Ndine wanu leroli

2. Cuma ninji ko popanda Inuyo, Mbuyanga,
Ndidzasiya zinthu zonsezo, Ndidzatsata ’Nu.

3. Pofulatire ’ne dzikoli, Mkhaletu nanenso;
Inu ndinu Cuma cangacho; Mnditonthozetu.

title: 142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli
content:
142 - Tsiku Lokoma Leroli

HOW SWEET!

1. Tsiku lokoma leroli, Loposa enawao;
La kuguniza zinathu za Mulungu wathuyo.

2. Inde, kukoma kumvatu Za mau acewo,
Otembenuza mtimawo Kuloza mmwambamo.

3. Ngati sititha chimolo, Kusiya tokha ’fe
Ambuye wathu, Yesuyo, Adzaticotsatu.

title: 143 - Mbuye Mtipititse
content:
143 - Mbuye Mtipititse

LORD, DISMISS US

1. Mbuye, mtipititse tonse, Ndi dalitso lanulo;
Mwa cikondi canu, Mbuye, Mutipatse nsisizo.
Mutitsitsimutse ife Pakuyenda m’dzikoli.

2. Tiyamika Inu, Mbuye, Kamba ka uthengawu;
Mphatso za cipulumutso Zidzazetu mtimawu
Kuti ife tikhalebe Okhulupirikawo

3. Nsiku zathu zonse, Mbuye, Tipereka kwanuko;
Mutilimbikitse, Mbuye, Kuti tisatopei
Mpaka tidzaone tonse, Ulemerero wanu.

title: 144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo
content:
144 - Ndipitabe Mtsogolomo

HIGHER GROUND

1. Ndiitabe mtsogolomo, Ndikwera nthawi zonsezo;
Ndipempha Inu, Mbuyanga, Mndikweze ’ne Pamwambapo.

CHORUS:
Mndikwezetu ’ne, Pamwamba nsika zonsezo;
Pamene sin’nafikepo, Mdikweze ’ne pamwambapo.

2. Sin’funatu kukhalabe Kumene kuli nkhawazo;
Ngakhale ena ’khaleko, Mdikweze ’ne pamwambapo.

3. Ndikhalebe pamwambapol, Ngakhale ndiyesedwa ’ne;
Ndikhulupira kutitu, Mndikweza ’ne pamwambapo.

title: 145 - Msakane Nchito Ya Mulungu
content:
<

145 - Msakane Nchito Ya Mulungu

ASK NOT TO BE EXCUSED

1. Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo, Mupite komweko afuna Iyeyo.
Anaitana ’nu, Amaitanabe, Mudzakondweradi Pogwira ntchitoyo.

CHORUS:
Bwerani, Msakane ntchitoyo, Bwerani, Kwa Mluungu wanuyo
Msakane ntchito ya Mulungu wanuyo, Mupite komweko Afuna Iyeyo.

2. Msakane ntchitoyo, Imvani leroli; Mwakana kalelo, Musakanenso bi!
Zotuta nzambiri, acepa ’nchitowo, Mukondekondetu Kukopa anthuwo

3. Msakane ntchitoyo, Msacedwenso; Pakukanidwabe Cikondi cicoka
Pamene Mzimuyo Aloza njirayo, Popempa Yesuyo, Idzani leroli.

title: 146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga
content:
146 - Mukhale M’mtima Mwanga

THY LIFE WITHIN ME

1. Mukhale m’mtima mwanga Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo
Mudniyankhire ine mafunso angawo
Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Mditsogoleretu,
Kuti ndionetsere Ukuru wanuwo.

2. Kacisi wa mtimanga Wayeretsedwatu,
Ulemerero wanu Uwale mkatimo;
Ndi thupi langa lonse Likhale lanulo,
Licite nthawi zonse Kufuna kwanuko

3. Ziwalo zanga zonse, Mzilamuliretu,
Mucite nazo zonse Kufuna kwanuko;
Ndizipereke ndense, osang’ungudzanso,
Polamulidwa nanu Mu ntchito zangazo.

4. Ndidzapumula ndithu Mu Mtima mwangamo,
Ndidzalindira Inu, Mukandifunatu;
Mukhale m’mtima mwanga, Ee, Yesu, Mfumuyo,
Mundiyankhire ine, Mafunso angawo.

title: 147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi
content:
147 - Tate Mundisendeze Mfupi

DRAW ME CLOSER TO THEE

1. Tate mundisendeze mfupi, Ndifuna Inuyo;
Mundiyangate mmanja mwanu, Ndipume mwanumo.

CHORUS:
Zingwe za cikondico, Mfupi, Zikokere ’ne;
Mfupi, mfupi, Ndinu m’mwambamo.

2. Yesu Mundisendeze mfupi, Ndisasiye inu;
Dzanja lanu linditsogoze, Ndisasocerei.

3. Mzimu mundisendeze mfupi, Ndifanane ndinuyo;
Mtima mwangamo munditsuke, Ndiyere ine mbu!

title: 148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu
content:
148 - Ponse Ponse Naye Yesu

ANYWHERE WITH JESUS

1. Ponse ponse naye Yesu ndzapita, Ponse ponse anditsogolera ’ne
. Pakapanda Iye sindikondwai, Ponse ponse naye sindiopatu.

CHORUS:
Ponsepo, Ponsepo, Sindiopai, Ponse ponse nay endidzapitapo

2. Ponse ponse Yesu ali ndi ine, Nkana ena andisiye m’dzikoli.
Nkana njira yanga iri yoopsya, Ponse ponse ndimyamika Yesuyo.

3. Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndidzagonatu, Mmene mdima undiphimba ineyo.
Ndziwa kuti ndidzauka tsikulo, Ponsepo ndi Yesu ndiko kwathuko.

title: 149 - Yenda Mkuunika
content:
149 - Yenda Mkuunika

WALK IN THE LIGHT

1. Yenda nk’unika Kwaceko, Atsogolere ’we;
Ndi Mzimu wa kumwambayo "Dzainga mdimawo.

CHORUS:
Yendanibe, Mkuunitatu;
Yendanibe, Mkun’ikatu kwa Mlunguyo.

Bass and Tenor;
Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo
Yendanibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo
Yendabibe mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo;
Mku’nikatu kwa Mlunguyo

2. Yenda mk’unika Yesuyo, Wowala m’mauyo
Atsogolera onswe, Okhulupirawo

3. Nkana mithunzi igwetu, Kudetsa njirayo.
Mdimawo udzathawatu, Ku’nika kwaceko.

4. Yenda mkk’unika kwaceko, Udziwe nsisizo
Cikondi cidzaposadi, Pofika Mmwambamo.

title: 150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?
content:
150 - Okunkhawo Ali Kuti?

WHERE ARE THE REAPERS?

1. Okunkhawo alitu kutiko? Amene akunkhatu zabwino?
Kucoka mu dziko loipali, Pocita ndi mau a Mlunguyo?

CHORUS:
Ndanitu adze kudzakunkha, Kusonkhanitsira anthu m’mwambamo?
Ndi yani atithandizeko, Pofunafuna zobalazo?

2. Pitani mu mphambano monsemo, Funani mupezemo abwino;
Pitani kwa anthu ponse ponse, Musonkhanitsire kumwambako.

3. Zobala zakhwima ponse ponse za m’dzikomu zilindira ife.
Okuntha acepa ku ntchitoyi, Zambiri zidzaonongekatu.

4. Anthuni idzani ndi zidazo, Kudzasonankhanitsa za m’mundamo;
Gwiranibe mpaka Ambuyeyo Adzabwera ali kukondwatu.

title: 151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa
content:
151 - Ndiganiza Za Dziko Lokometsa

WILL THERE BE ANY STARS?

1. Ndiganiza za dziko lokometsalo, Komwe nzafikako tsikulo;
Podzaima pa mbali M’lumutsiyo, Ndidzavala nyenyezizo ko?

CHORUS:
Ndidzabvala nyenyezizo ko, Mbuyanga, Mmene dzuwa lidzalowadi (lowadi)
Mmene ndazuka mmalo a mpumulo, Ndidzabvala nyenyezizo ko (tsikulo)

2. M’mphamvu yaceyo ndigwiretu ntchitoyo, Kuti ndikopetu anthuwo;
Kuti ndzapate nyenyezi pa tsikulo, Mmene Mbuye ’dzayamika ’fe.

3. Ndidzakondwera poona Mbuyanga, Ndikupereka mituloyo;
Ndidzakondwera m’mzinda wa golidiwo, Ndikadzabvala nyenyezizo.

title: 152 - Yesu Mundilankhule
content:
152 - Yesu Mundilankhule

SPEAK TO MY SOUL

1. Yesu, Mundilankhule, Mau ofatsawo;
Mndinong’oneze kuti, SUlitu wekha ’we.
Mtima munditsegule, Kuti ndimvere ’Nu;
Mdzaze mu Mtima wanga, Kuti ndikondwedi.

CHORUS:
Mundinong’onezetu, mwa nsisi zanuzo
Udzagonjetsa ndithu, Udzamasukadi.
Mundilankhule, Mbuye, Tsiku ndi tsikunso,
Ndimvetu mau anu, Sulita wekha ’we

2. Yesu, munene mau Ndi ana anuwo,
Kuyang’anira Inu, Muwapjunzitsetu;
Kuti apereketu Moyo kwa inuyo,
Udze ufumu wanu, Kuti ’dzaone ’Nu.

3. Kale munaonetsa Kufuna kwanuko,
Yanga ndidziwe ntchito, Ndicite zanuzo;
Ndilemekeze Inu, Kwa anthu onsewo,
Ncite kufuna kwanu, Masiku onsewo.

title: 153 - Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga
content:
153 - Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga

JUST FOR TO-DAY

1. Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga, Za mawazo;
Mndipulumutse m’chimolo Lero lokha;
Mau ndisalankhulenso Oipawo;
Msungetu mlomo wangawu, Lero lino.

2. Ndzagwira ntchito yanuyo, Ndzapemphanso;
Ndikhalal wacifundoyo, Lero lokha;
Mundithandize, Mbuyanga, Kumera ’Nu;
Kuti ndidzipereketu pa leroli.

3. Ngatitu moyo wangawo Utha ndithu;
M’malonjezano anuwo ndikhalebe;
Sindipemphera, Mbuyanga, Za mawazo;
M’ndisunge m’manja mwanumo pa leroli.

title: 154 - Mlonda, Tandiuze Ine
content:
154 - Mlonda, Tandiuze Ine

WATCHMAN, TELL ME

1. Mlonda, tandiuze ine, Kunja kuli cutako?
Zosonyeza kudza kwace, Kodi zionekadi?
Inde, Mlendo, taonanil, Kuca kwayandikiratu,
Bvala za kukoma zako, Kuli kuca, dzuka ’we.

2. Mlonda, nyali iunika Mommo m’njira mwakomo;
Zozizwitsa m’dziko monse, Zisonyeza tsikulo.
Podzaomba pa lipenga, Pakudzuka a ku manda,
Omwalira mwa Ambuye, Adzabvala cosafa.

3. Mlonda, pfu’la liri kudza Tsiku lalikurulo.
Onse alalike kuti, Mfumu yayandkatu.
Inde, mlendo ’we, ndiona, Dziko lopambana lija.
Mzinda wopambana yonse, Uoneka tsidyalo.

4. Mlonda, undiuze ine, Za mu mzinda momwemo,
Mmene Mfumu ikukhala, Pa cimpando caceco.
Dziko lija likuwala Ndi ulemerero wace;
Kuli dzuwa ndi mitengo, Ndi mitsinje yoposa.

5. Dzuwa lituruka ndithu, La usana womwewo.
Onse alalike kuti, Tsiku layandikatu.
Aulendo aonenso, Kuli phiri la Mulungu;
Tidzafika, konko msanga, Tidzakondwererako

title: 155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phriko
content:
155 - Kapenatu Si Ku Phriko

I’LL GO WHERE YO WANT ME TO

1. Kapenatu si ku phiriko, Kapena ku nyanjako,
Kapena ku nkhondo komwetu, Mufuna ndipite ’ne;
Komatu akandituma ’ne Ku dziko la ’lendowo,
Ndilola mwa mphamvu ya Mbuyeyo, Ndzapita mufunako.

CHORUS:
Ndzapita kulmene mufunako, M’phiri, m’dambo, ndi m’nyanja
Ndzanena zimene mufunazo, Ndzatsata Mpulumutsiyo

2. Alipo mau Ambuyeyo, Afuna ndinetu;
Kapena kuli wocimwayo Wosowa thandizoli;
Ambuye, mkanditsogoza ’ne, Ingabvute njirayo,
Ndzauza uthenga wabwinowo, Ndzanena mufunazo.

3. Alipo malo a inenso Ku munda wa Mbuyeyo,
Ndzagwira ntchito yotutayo Ya Yesu wopacikwa.
Pokhulupirira mwanumo, podziwa mndikonda ’ne,
Ndzacita kufunatu kwanuko, Ndzakhala mufunazo.

title: 156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka
content:
156 - Mau Akukwiya Leka

ANGRY WORDS! OH, LET THEM NEVER

1. Mau akukwiya leka, Musanene konsetu;
Muwauze mau onse Asanadetse m’lomowo.

CHORUS:
Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye, Ana mverani malamulowo;
Kondananitu, Ati Ambuye, Ana mverani lamulo.

2. Cikonditu ndi coyera, Ndi cibwenzi comwenso,
Musaciononge konse Ndi mau akukwiyawo.

3. Maubwenzi amasweka, Ndi mabanja omwenso;
Ka’mba mau a kukwiy aOlankhulidwa mwa nsontho.

title: 157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira
content:
157 - Wakufetsa Ndi Kulira

HARVEST TIME
1. Wakufetsa ndi kulira, Mbeu za cikondico,
Wosatopa, wosagona, Yesu amdalitsa ’ye.

CHORUS:
Ona! mmera wakukondwa, Dzinthu dzonse dzacanso
Ona! M’minda mwayeratu, Layandika khunkhalo.

2. Mvula idzatsirirapo, Dzuwa ’dzawaliranso,
Ndi zipatso zidzabala, M’mphamvu ya Mulunguyo.

3. Fesa mbeu, usatope, Usaope konsetu,
Nkana utapeza bvuto, Udzatuta mokondwa.

title: 158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika
content:
158 - Masika A Dziko Ayandika

HASTEN ON, GLAD DAY

1. Masika a dziko ayandikatu, Aitana Mbuye okololawo;
Ndi mina yeyera pa dziko lonse, Ndi mwini zotuta wayandikanso.

CHORUS:
’Dzanitu msanga, Tengatu zotuta; Mdzatitengae ’fe, Kwathuko

Alto, Tenor, ndi Bass;
Idzanitu angelo, msangatu; Tengereni zotuta mmwambamo.
Mudzatengetu ife, kunkatu, Kwathu mmwambamo.

2. E, tsiku lopanda misozi konse, Layandika kudza mothamangatu;
Akubalalika ndi ucimowo, Mwasonkhetu nthawi isanathei.

3. Ikomatu ntchito ya cikondico, Kasupe wosaphwa wa kumwambako;
Cikonditu ndico ciitana ’fe, Cigwiritsa ntchito, Cibalitsatu.

title: 159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu
content:
159 - Mbuyanga Ndisowa Inu

HOW MUCH I NEED THEE

1. Mbuyanga, ndisowa Inu! Ndine wosaukadi;
Mundigwire dzanja, Mbuye, Mudnilimbikitsetu.

CHORUS:
Nthawitu zonsezo, Ndimasowa Inu, Mbuye!
Nthawitu zonsezo, Yesu mundisunge ’ne.

 2. Mundibveke zakuyera, Zanga ziri sanzatu;
Mndiphunzitse kupemphera, Mundipatse mphamvuzo.

3. Mudnitsogolere, Mbuye, Ndekha ndilepheradi;
Myende nane pa myalapo, Ndinu nyali yangayo.

4. Ndigapezetu mabvuto, Ofiritsa mtimanga;
Ndidzaumirira Inu Mdzandisangalatsadi.

title: 160 - Yesu Andisungetu!
content:
160 - Yesu Andisungetu!

KEPT FOR JESUS

1. Yesu andisungetu! Ndi mphamvu yaceyo;
Dziko lisandidetse; Kuti nditsate ’Ye.

CHORUS:
Yesu andisungetu! Mbuye ndipempha ’Nu;
Inetu ndine cabe, cabe, Inu ndi zonsezo.

2. Yesu andisungetu! Nditumikire ’Ye;
Ndicitetu kufuna, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo.

3. Yesu andisungetu! Dziko ndilisiya;
Ndikhaletu wofatsa, Woyera mtimamo.

4. Yesu andisungetu! N’khaletu waceyo;
N’khaletu wace yekha, Ku nthawi zonsezo.

title: 161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye
content:
161 - Tsamwali Ndiri Naye

MY LORD AND I

1. Tsamwali ndiri naye Wolondakondadi;
Akonda ’ne koposatu, Akonda konseko;
Ndikhala ndi tsamwaliyo, Ndimkonda bwinotu;
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndikhalabe.

2. Ndifo’ka ndithu mwina, Adziwa Mbuyeyo
Auza ’ne ndimtsamire, Andithangatatu;
Anditsogoza inetu, Mwa kuunikako,
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndiyendabe.

3. Zokondwa, za cisoni, Ndiuza Mbuyeyo;
Ndiuza Mbuye zonsetu Za Mtima mwangamo;
Auza ’ne cocitatu, Anena, Yesanso;
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye Ndinenabe.

4. Adziwa ndikufuna, Kukopa winayo,
Auza ’ne kupitatu Kunena nayenso;
Cikondi ca Mulunguyo, Ndi imfa ya Yesu;
Pamodzi ndi Ambuye ndicitabe.

title: 162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu
content:
162 - Yesu Anditsogozatu

ALL THE WAY

1. Yesu anditsogozatu; Nanganso ndifunanji?
Kodi ndimkaika Iye, Wonditsogolerayo?
Mtenderewo andipatsa, Mwa cikhulupiroco!
Mkana lindigwere bvuto, Yesu athangata ’ne’
Mkana lindigwere bvuto, Yesu athangata ’ne;

2. Yesu anditsogolera, Andisangalatsanso;
Athandiza ’ne m’mayeso, Andidyetsa mkatewo;
Nkana ndiri wakutopa, Ludzu landigwiranso,
Mu Thanthwelo Yesu Kristu, Ndionamo madziwo;
Mu Thanthwelo Yesu Kristu, Ndionamo madziwo;

3. Yesu anditsogolera, Mwa cikondi caceco!
Alonjeza ’ne mpumulo, Mnyumba ya Atateyo;
Nkadzauka tsiku lijaa, Ndidzapita mmwambamo,
Ndidzayimba kosaleka, Yesu natsogoza ’ne;
Ndidzayilmba kosaleka, Yesu natsogoza ’ne;

title: 163 - ’Mvani Yesu Aitana
content:
163 - ’Mvani Yesu Aitana

HERE AM I, SEND ME

1. ’Mvani Yesu aitana, Ndani angagwiretu?
Mindayo yayera kale, Ndani akakunkhemo?
Momvekadi aitana, Mphotho ’dzalandira ’we
Ndani angayankhe msanga, Ndine Mbuye, tumeni.

2. Nkana sungapite mtari Ku maiko enawo,
Ungapeze anthu ena Apafupi ndi iwe.
Ngati sungalalikire mnga ngati Paulo,
Unganene za cikondi Ca Ambuye wakoyo.

3. Ngati sungakhale mlonga Wocenjeza anthuwo;
Kuwauza anthu njira yonka nayo mmwambamo;
Pakupempherera ena, Ungagwire ntchitoyo.
Ungacite ngati Huri pothangata Moseyo.

4. Mmene anthu alikufa, Mbuye aitanabe;
Wina asamamve nuti, singacite kanthui.
Gwira antchito wakupatsa, Nuigwire msangatu;
Ndi kuyankha poitana, Ndine Mbuye, tumeni.

title: 164 - Pa Mapazi Ace A Yesu
content:
164 - Pa Mapazi Ace A Yesu

AT THE FEET OF JESUS

1. Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Ndimva mau acewo!
Ee, pafupi ndi Ambuye, N’khale nthawi zonsezo;
Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Ndiyang’anan m’mbuyomo,
Ee, cikondi cace conse, Cakopadi mtimanga.

2. Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Malo opambanawo;
Ndisiyepo chimo langa, Ndi kupeza mpumulo;
Pa mapazi ace Yesu, Ndimalira mtimanga,
Pomwe ndimapeza nsisi, Tsiku liri l onselo.

3. Inu yesu mdidalitse, Ndigwadira Inuyo;
Muyang’anetu pa ine, Nane ndikuoneni;
Ndikhaletu nawo Mtima, Monga Yesu Mbuyeyo,
Ndionetseretu yesu, Cilungamo cangaco.

title: 165 - Ndikonda, Ndikonda Ambuyanga
content:
165 - Ndikonda, Ndikonda Ambuyanga

I LOVE THEE
1. Ndikonda, ndikonda Ambuyanga ’Nu;
Ndiknda Yesuyo, Mpulumutsitu.
Ndikonda inuyo mudziwadi;
Zintchito zinena kukonga kwanga.

2. Ndikndwa, ndikondwa kopambanadi!
Ndaima pa phiri ndiyang’anitsa
Ku mzinda woyera ndkakhaleko,
Ndi Yesu, angeo, ndi anzangawo.

3. Yesu ’Nu, Mp’lumutsi, mndidalitsetu,
Ndinutu cimwemwe mpumulo wanga.
Ndiyimba cikondi ca Mbuyangayo;
Cisomo canuco cindidzaza ’ne.

4. Ndaniyo oposa Mpulumutsiyo?
Akonda inenso nan’thangata ’ne.
Ndiyamika Mbuye, ndiyimbira ’Ye,
Ndikndwa koposa mu mtimangamo.

title: 166 - Thanthwe Long’ambika
content:
166 - Thanthwe Long’ambika

ROCK OF AGES

1. Thanthwe long’ambikatu, Ndibisale momwemu!
Madzi ndipo mwaziwo Zoturuka m’nthtimo,
Zinditsuke m’mtima mbu! Zindilimbikitsetu.

2. Nchito zanga zonsezo, Sizikondweretsa ’Nu;
Ndikazigwiritsadi, Ndikalira nsonizi,
Zonse sizikwanazi, Koma Yesu yekhayo.

3. M’manja mwanga cabe bi, Mtanga ndingogwiradi;
Marisece mbveke ’ne, Ndiri ndekha, msunge ’ne,
Ndithawire mtsinjewo, Mudnitsuke m’mtimamo.

4. M’moyo uno kunsiku, Pena ndimwaliratu,
Mmene ndidzaukanso Tionane masowo;
Thantwe long’ambikatu, Ndibisale momwemu.

title: 167 - Maziko Olimba
content:
167 - Maziko Olimba

FIRM FOUNDATION

1. Maziko olimba Ambuyathuyo, Waikira inutu m’mau mwace,
Anene ciani koposa ico? Wathawira ndani kwa Mp’lumutsiyo;
Wathawira ndani kwa Mp’lumutsiyo.

2. Ndikati uyende mitsinjepo, Madziwo sadzakukokolola ’we;
Pakuti ndzakhala pamodzi nawe, Ndzadalitsa iwe, ndzapatule ’we;
Ndzadalitsa iwe, ndzapatula ’we.

3. Poyenda ’we m’moto wa mayesowo, Cisomo cangaco cikwaniradi;
Sudzapsa konsei ndangofunatu kucotsa zoipa kuyeretsa ’we,
Kucotsa zoipa kuyeretsa ’we.

4. Wakudza kwa Yesu kubisalako, Sindimataya kunjatu kwa mdaniyo;
Ngakhale adani amgwedezetu, Sindimsiya konse, sindimsiyatu;
Sindimsiya konse, sindimsiyatu.

title: 168 - Yehova Ndi Mbusa Wangatu
content:
168 - Yehova Ndi Mbusa Wangatu

THE LORD IS MY SHEPHERED

1. Yehova ndi Mbusa, Sin’dzasowai, Ndigona ku busa La msipu wace
Anditsogolera Ku madzi ace, Anditsitsimutsa Ndi mphamvu yace.

2. Anditsogolera M’mabande mwace, Cifukwa ca dzina Lokondwedwalo.
Ngakhale ndiyenda pafupi infa, H! sindiopa Zoipa zonse.

3. Cibonga ndi ndodo Za Mbusa wanga Zindisangalatsa Masiku onse.
Mundiyalikira Pa maso panga, Mkkuona kwa mdani Cakudya canga.

4. Mudzoza mafuta Pa mutu panga, Mwadzaza cifundo Mu cikho canga
Udzanditsatira Ukoma wanu, Ndidzakhala nanu masiku onse.

title: 169 - Ugoneranji Mwana Wa Mfumu?
content:
169 - Ugoneranji Mwana Wa Mfumu?

HEIR OF THE KINGDOM

1. Ugoneranji mwana wa mfumu
Kwinanso wayandikira mmwamba?
Dzuka, nyamuka, ubvale za nkhondo;
Bweratu nthawi isanathei.

2. Anthu a mdziko adzanjenjemera,
Adzaopsedwa ndi kudza kwace;
Mvetsa migugu abwera Ambuye,
Mwana wa mfumu usacedwatu.

3. Usacedwenso ndi zinthu za mdziko
Ulemerero udzathadi phe!
Dula zinsinga zolimba za mdani,
Mwana wa mfumu kondwera ndithu.

4. Usayang’anetu kwina iyai,
Ona nonse kuwala m’mapiri monsemo,
Mwana wa mfumu zileke zonse.
Yembekeza ufumu wace;

title: 170 - Mulungu, Mfumu
content:
170 - Mulungu, Mfumu

MY MAKER AND MY KING

1. Mulungu, Mfumu ’Nu, Ndiribe mphamvutu,
Munandilenga, mundisunga Nthawi zonsezi
Munandilenga, Mundisunga Nthawi zonsezi.

2. Ndiribe winanso, Ndimatsamira ’Nu;
Zabwino zanu zipambana, Ndicitenji ko?
Zabwino zanu zipambana, Ndicitenji ko?

3. Ndipatse ciani ko? Poona zonsezi
Zakhala zanu kale ndithu, Ndidzatani ko?
Zakhala zanukale ndithu. Ndidzatani ko?

4. Mufuna mtimangu, Ndipatsa msangatu.
Ndikhale wanu nthawi zonse, Mndilandire ’ne.
Ndikhale wanu nthawi zonse, Mndilandire ’ne.

title: 171 - Kunja Kuli Kuca Kodi
content:
171 - Kunja Kuli Kuca Kodi

WHAT OF THE NIGHT?

1. Kunja kuli kuca kodi? Mlonda, tandiuze ’ne.
Kodi nthanda yaturuka? Kodi kunja kwacatu?
Ukuona kodi kuti kwacadi?
Ukuona kodi kuti kwacadi?

2. Tifunsitse za ulendo, Kodi ulikuthadi?
Tayandikatu ku doko, Kodi tingaoneko?
Tingaone dziko lakumwambako?
Tingaone dziko lakumwambako?

3. Tipfuuletu kolimba, Kunja kuli kucatu;
Nthanda iri kuturuka, Ioneka mwambamo.
Kondwerani, tayandika kwathuko;
Kondwerani, tayandika kwathuko.

4. Tiri nao mau ace, Otitsogolera ’fe.
Tithamangetu dzolimba, Kuti tikafikeko.
Pfuulani mokondwera m’mtimamo
Pfuulani mokondwera m’mtimamo.

title: 172 - Ambuye Wathu Yesu, Mubwera Liti?
content:
172 - Ambuye Wathu Yesu, Mubwera Liti?

HOW LONG

1. Ambuye wathu Yesu, Mubwera liti ko?
Mitima yatopadi, Mucedweranji ko?
Lidzadza liti tsiku lonyezimiralo
Limene anthu anu adzakondweranso?

2. Musiya mpaka liti, Ee, nyumba yanuyo?
Mwacedwacedwa, Mbuye, Ambiri agwatu;
Agwidwa ndi za dziko, Antchito anuwo;
Atsalatu pang’ono Oyang’anira ’Nu.

3. Dzutsani anthu anu, Tumani mauwo;
Amene anthu onse, Akudza Mbuyeyo!
Ziyake nyali zathu, tibvale bwinotu
Tikonze Mtima wathu, Kuona Mbuyeyo.

title: 173 - Ndikadakhala Naco Cikhulupiro
content:
173 - Ndikadakhala Naco Cikhulupiro

O FOR A FAITH!

1. Ndikadakala nacotu cikhulupiroco,
Sindinganjenjemeretu M’mabvuto monsemo.

2. Coti ndikalangiswa ’ne, Ndisang’ung’udzatu,
Popwetekedwa iney o ndikulupira ’Ye.

3. Comwe ciwala m’mtimanga, Pokhala m’mdimamo,
Cymene siciopatu, Sicikaikanso.

4. Cosasunthika konsetu, Pokwiya dzikoli,
Macimo sangakope ’ne Akandidzera ’ne.

5. Mbuye, patseni mphamvuyo, Cikhulupiroco.
Cinkana pansi panotu Ndidzakondwerabe

title: 174 - Akristu Ali Naco Ciyembekezo
content:
174 - Akristu Ali Naco Ciyembekezo

HOW CHEERING!

1. Akristu ali nacotu Ciyembekezoco
Cimatikondweretsatu M’mabuto monsemo
Cimatikondweretsatu M’mabuto monsemo.

2. Cinema za mpumulowo Pokhala ndi Kristu.
Pamodzi ndi anzangawo tidzakhalitsako.
Pamodzi ndi anzangawo Tidzakhalitsako.

3. Mayeso ndi macimowo Kulibe mdzikolo.
Misozi ndipo imfanso kulibe komweko
Misozi ndipo imfanso kulibe komweko.

4. Masiku athe msangatu, Ambuye Adzetu.
Tilakalaka kuona Dzikolo ndi Inu
Tilakalaka kuona Dzikolo ndi Inu

title: 175 - Mpulumutsi, Mbusa Wathu
content:
175 - Mpulumutsi, Mbusa Wathu

SAVIOUR, LIKE A SHEPHERD

1. Mpulumutsi, Mbusa wathu, Mutisogolere ’fe;
Mutiwete, mutisunge, M’khola mwanu tinkemo;
Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mnatigula ana ’nu,
Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mnatigula ana ’nu.

2. Ndife anu, mutikonda, Mutiperekeze ’fe,
Mcotse nsoni ndi zoipa, Mbweze osocerawo;
Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mumve mapemperowo,
Yesu wathu, Yesu wathu, Mumve mapemperowo.

3. Munanena mulandira Osauka omwewo;
Inu ndinu wa cifundo, Ndi wopulumutsayo;

Poti ndiri wotopa, wopanda thandizo.

CHORUS:
Nthano yakale uze, Nthano yakale uze,
Nthano yakale uze, Ya Yesu wokonda.

2. Pang’ono ndi pang’ono, Motsimikizadi;
Pakuti ndaipadi, Yesu nandifera;
Nthano yonseyo uze, Musacite mphwayi,
M’nthawi yonse ya bvuto, Andisangalatsa.

3. Nenatu yomwe ija, Ukhala ndi mantha,
Kuti dziko loipa, Ndilikondetsetsa;
Ulemu wa dzikowu Uyamba m’moyomu,
Uze nthano yakale; Yesu akuciza.

title: 234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko
content:
234 - Yesu Nyali Ya Dziko

JESUS THE LIGHT OF THE WORD

1. Ha! Nayimba angelo, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Mwana wabadwa Mfumu, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

CHORUS:
Yenda m’kuunika kwabwiniko,
Idza kumene kuli cifuno,
Kuwala kwa msana ndi usiku;
Yesu, nyali ya dziko.

2. Mapfukonu kondwani, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Kondwani ndi a m’mwamba, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

3. M’mwamba amlekeza, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Yesu Mbuye wosatha, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

4. Mfumu ya mtenderedi, Yesu nyali ya dziko;
Dzuwa la cilungamo, Yesu nyali ya dziko.

title: 235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula
content:
235 - Ladzanso Tsiku Lakupumula

AGAIN THE DAY RETURNS

1. Ladzanso tsiku lakupula,
Lodalitsidwa ndi Mlunguyo;
Iye napuma ntchito zacezo,
Ndipo afuna tipumulenso.

2. Tiyeni tonse pa Sabatali,
Timveretu Kufuna kwaceko;
Tsono poyimba ndi kupemphera,
Iye adzakondwera nafetu.

3. Mbuye, Muchere khutu lanulo;
Mumve pemphero la t iana ’fe;
Kumbukirani lonjezanolo,
Mupulumutse otaikawo.

4. Inu, Atate wakumwambako,
Ndinu wakuticinjiriza ’fe.
Ndinu wakutitsogoleranso,
Tikuongani nthawi zonsezo.

title: 236 - Cifundo Cace
content:
236 - Cifundo Cace

HIS LOVING KINDNESS

1. Dzuka moyo wanga kondwa, Yimbira cipulumutso;
Ndimyimbire nyimbo; Cifuno cace; Ncoposa!

CHORUS:
Wacifuno, wacifundo cace, ncoposa!

2. ’Nandiona wotayika, Anandikondabe ndithu;
’Nabweza potayikane; Cifundo cace, Ncoposa!

3. Acurukadi adani, Ngakhale acite nazo,
Moyo wanga asungabe; cifundo cace, Ncamphamvu!

4. Bvuto loda ngati mtambo, Lasonkhana ligundira,
Aima pafupi nane; Cifuno cace, Ncokoma!

5. Mwini Mfumu akadzadza, Kudzatenga anthu ace,
Ndikayimba pa tsikulo Cifundo cace, Kosatha!

title: 237 - Akristu Limbikani!
content:
237 - Akristu Limbikani!

STAND UP! STAND UP FOR JESUS!

1. Akristu limbikani, imani mtimanji!
Mbendera nyamulani, musanthenthemerebi.
Wotsogolera wathu ndi Mwana wa Mulungu;
Adzagonjetsa onse, adani athuwo.

2. Tigwire nkhondo yomwe ya Mbuye wathuyo;
Ticotse zakuipa zokhala mtimamo.
Sitikwanira tokha kuleka zinthu zomwe;
Koma Mbuyathu Yesu atithangatatu.

3. Tsopano timenyana ndi zakuipazo,
Pamene nkhondo yatha tidzanka kwathuko;
Yesu adzalandira ankhondo ace onse,
Adzakhalitsa naye Kumwamba komweko.

4. Limbikani anzathu! Msanga nkhondo itha
Lero kuli cinkhondo, mawa tigonjetsa
Kwa iye wolakika, adzakhala moyo;
Pamodzi ndi Mfumuyo ’dzakhala kosatha.

title: 238 - Akulowa M’zipata
content:
238 - Akulowa M’zipata

SWEEPING THROUGH THE GATES

1. Awa ndani pa tsidya la Nyanja, Omwe payola manda acetu,
Akondwera mwa Yesu? Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

CHORUS:
Akulowa mzinda wa Yerusalemu,
Asamba m’mazi (wace) wa nkhosa;
Alowa m’zipata za Yerusalemu,
Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

 2. Awa ndiwo anapeza Yesu, Pamene anali anyamata,
Nalandira cisomo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

3. Awa ndiwo mansautso yao, Anapeza kupuma mwa Yesu,
Mtendere mu mtimamo, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

4. Iwo adapirira mabvuto, Anapyola pakati pa moto:
Yesu ati idzani, Asamba m’mwazi Wace.

title: 239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?
content:
239 - Kodi Uli Kulemedwa?

ART THOUGH WEARY?

1. Kodi uli kulemedwa ndi zoipazo?
Idza kuno ati Yesu, Pumako.

2. Ndikamzindikira n’inji Mbuye wangayo?
Ali ndi mabala m’manja mwacemo.

3. Kodi ali ndi cilemba m’mphumi mwacemo?
E! Cilembaco ca minga cirimo.

4. Ndikampeza ndikamtsata ninji pansi?
Masauko ndi misozi ziripo.

5. Ndikamfunafuna Iye ndipezenjiko?
Kumariza kwa cisoni conse.

6. Ndikampempha anditenge ati bwanji ko?
Ati Yesu "Idza msanga, idzatu."

7. Kukamtsata, kukampeza ndisaukanji?
Oyera, atumwi, ati idzani.

Amen.

title: 240 - Pakhomo
content:
240 - Pakhomo

AT THE DOOR

1. Mpulumutsi Pakhomopo! Agogoda mofatsa tu,
Walindira, alindabe, Musamcitire cipongwe.

2. Akulangiza ugule Golide yo ndi Cobvala;
Dzoza maso, muonetu, Ucotse zonyasa zako.

3. Mvera mau a umboni Ati usanke wacedwa;
Uli wonyoza, wofunda! Khala cangu usanduke.

4. Ncito yayandika kutha, Kudandaulira kutha;
Wonynsa anyansebe tu, Woyera akhalebe conco.

5. Lonyowa tsitsi ndi mame, Cifukwa akukondadi,
Dzuka! Tsegula citseko; Muuze asacedwenso.

6. Alowe wokondedwayo; Upume pamaso pace.
Mwa ciyanjano cokoma Ndzadye naye, Iye nane.

title: 241 - Dziko Labwino
content:
241 - Dziko Labwino

BEULAH LAND

1. Ndapeza dziko lokoma, Ndi zinthu zonse ndi zanga;
Zokometsetsa konseko, Usiku wandicokera.

CHORUS:
O, dzikolo, lokomalo, Pa phiri lokometsalo,
Ndipenyetsetsa ku Nyanja, Manyumba andikonzera,
Ndiyang’anitsa dzikolo, Komwe ndidzakhalitsako.

2. Ndiyenda ndi Mpulumutsi, Andikondwera m’njiramo;
Anditsogolera bwino, Kumwamba ndikafikeko.

3. Mphepo zinunkhira bwino, Za mitengo ya dzikolo,
Maluwa nao safota, Mitsinje simaumako.

4. Mphepo za kumadzulozo, Ndi nyimbo kumwambako,
Angelo onyezimira Ayimba za mphamvu zace.

title: 242 - Codala Cikondi
content:
242 - Codala Cikondi

BLEST BE THE TIE

1. Codala cikondi, Cotiyanjanitsa!
Ciyanjano ca akristu, Cifana ca mwamba.

2. Pa mpando, wa Mlungu, Wathu tipemphera;
Tisowa cinthu cimodzi, Cotisangalatsa.

3. Timathandizana, Akatundu athu;
Timalirirana tonse, M’zobvuta zathuzo.

4. Tikalekanatu, Timanva cisoni;
Tiyembekezerebetu, Kudzakomananso.

title: 243 - Dzuwa Moyowe
content:
243 - Dzuwa Moyowe

ARISE MY SOUL, ARISE

1. Dzuka moyo wanga, Cotsa mantha ako;
Nsembe ya mwaziwo, Cifukwa ca ine;
Indiimira ku mpando, Indiimira ku mpando;
Dzina langa lalembedwa.

2. Kumwamba alipo, Kundipembedzera,
Cikondi caceco, Cinakhetsa mwazi;
Anatifera tonsefe, Anatiferea tonsefe,
Awaza mpando wansisi.

3. Mabala asanu, Anapwetekapo;
Mutu "khululukani" Atitu "khululukani,"
Msalole wolapa afe!

4. Tate amamumva, Wodzozedwa wace;
Sangacotse mwana, Wofika kwa Iye,
Mzimu ubvomera mwazi, Mzimu ubvomera mwazi,
Ndabadwira mwa mulungu.

title: 244 - Idza Kwa Yesu
content:
244 - Idza Kwa Yesu

COME TO THE SAVIOUR

1. ’Dza kwa YEsu, ’dza kwa Yesu
’Dza kwa Yesu lero, lero, ’dza kwa Yesu,
’Dza kwa Yesu lero.

2. Pulumuka, pulumuka,
Pulumuka lero, lero pulumuka,
Pulumuka lero.

3. Akhozadi, akhozadi,
Akhozadi lero, lero akhozadi,
Akhozadi lero.

4. Muitane, muitane,
Muitane lero, lero muitane,
Muitane lero.

5. Alindira, alindira
Alindira lero, lero alindira,
Alindira lero.

6. Mkhulupire, mkhulupire,
Mkhulupire lero, lero mkhulupire
Mkhulupire lero.

7. Adalitsa, adalitsa,
Adalitsa iwe, iwe adalitsa,
Adalitsa iwe.

title: 245 - Palibe Dzina Lina
content:
245 - Palibe Dzina Lina

NO OTHER NAME

1. Dzina lokhalo la Yesu, Ndilo dzina lokoma;
Likondwetsa ’ngelo m’mwamba, Ndi Akhristu tonsefe.

CHORUS:
Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu,
Dzina, dzina, Palibe longa la Yesu.

2. Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu, Pamene ndibvutika;
Dzina lokha ndi la Yesu pamene ndikondwera.

3. Ndikufuna kudzamwona, Podza mu’lemerero,
Ndidzamve Wacita bwino, Ndidzakondwererako.

4. Ngat’ afuna ngwire ntchito, M’munda wace wa mpesa,
Kuli bwino Yesu yekha, ’Dalitse ntchito zanga.

5. Ngat’afuna kuti ndife, Akhudze thupi langa,
Kukhale bwino ndi Yesu, Ndikhulupira mwa’ye.

title: 246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu
content:
246 - Mnenere Yesu Liu

JUST A WORD FOR JESUS

1. Mnenere Yesu liu; Bwenzi la pamtima,
Utiuzetu zomwe; Anakucitira.

CHORUS:
Pomunenera Yesu Zidzatithandiza;
Mau pang’ono pokha, Nenga, yimba, pempha.

2. Mnenere Yesu liu; Wakhululukidwa,
Ndi kuyesayesako, Ufike kumwamba.

3. Mnenere Yesu liu, Kukana sinditha;
Ndikonda Mpulumutsi, Wondiombolayo.

4. Mnenere Yesu liu, Usataye nthawi;
Wozemba ntchito yace, Apeza cisoni.

5. Mnenere Yesu, liu, Pocepa nkhongono;
Dzuka ukafooka, Mlekere zinazo.

title: 247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba
content:
247 - Angelo Ayimba Kumwamba

SING THE BELLS OF HEAVEN

1. Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwemwe,
Akatembenuka wocimwa;
Tate amucingamira kunjira,
Mwana wotopa wosocera.

CHORUS:
Angelo ayimba kumwamba;
Ulemu, ulemu m’mingoli,
Opulumukawo abvekedwa mbu,
Ayimbira molemekeza.

2. Mabelo kumwamba! Kuli cimwe
Wotayika wabvomeredwa;
Wocimwayo wabwezedwa ku chimo,
Wabadwanso ngati walero.

title: 248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita
content:
248 - Yesu Mnzarete Apita

JESUS OF NAZARETH PASSETH BY

1. Cikhamuci cifunanji Coyenda motanganidwa. Cosankhana tsiku ntsiku? Ndiuzenji acitanji?
Khala cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita"
Khalal cete ndikuuze; "Yesu Mnazarete apita.’’

2. Yesuyo ndani? Wakuti agwedeza mudzi conci?
Mlendo cabe waluntha Kugwedeza anthu conci?
Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"
Modzidzimutsa nayankha; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"

3 . Yesu! Pansi natsikira Ngati munthu nayendapo;
Opsinjika nawapeza, Odwalal opundukawo,
Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"
Akhungu nakondwa kumva; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"

4. Lero ayenda ponsepo Tiona mapazi ace;
Ayenda m’nchito zathuzo, Adza kwathu kudzakhala;
Mokondwa tipfuulitse: "Yesu Mnazarete apita;
Mokondwa tipfuulitse; "Yesu Mnazarete apita,"

5. Idzani olemedwanu! Mupume mpeze mudziwo
Otayika a Atate, Bwerani mulandire;
Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita,"
Oyesedwanu thawani; "Yesu Mnazaretu apita."

6. Ukanabe naitana, Nunyoza cikondi cace,
Cisoni adzakusiya Maomboledwe acewo;
Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."
Udzati mayo ndacedwa "Mnazarete wandisiyadi."

title: 249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo
content:
249 - Nkhosa Zambiri M’Kholamo

THERE WERE NINETY AND NINE

1. Nkhosa zace zambiri m’kholamo
Anasunga mbusayo
Anasunga mbusayo
Imodzi inasocerera,
Yotaika ku thengo.
Kutari ku phiri loopsya
Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo
Kutari ndi mbusa waceyo.

2. Mbuye, muli zambiri m’kholamu
Kodi sizikwanira?
Nayankha mbusa, ndi yangayo
Imene yataika.
Ngakhale njoopsya njirayo,
Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.
Ndilinga ku phiri kupeza.

3. Koma opulumuka sadziwa
M’khwawa mbusa napyola,
Ndi mdima wo’psya usikuwo
Polonda nkhosayo.
Anamva kulira kutari
Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.
Mapeza yofo’ka, ikufa.

4. Mbusa, ndiona mwazi m’njirayi;
Ndi cifukwa ciani ko?
Ndinaukhetsa potsata’we,
Kubwenza ku kholako.
Ndi m’manja mwalaswa bwanjimo?
Ndalaswa pofunafuna’we.
Ndalaswa pofunafuna’ we.

5. Ndipo ponse pa phiri ndi m’dambo,
Ndi m’makwawa ponsepo
Namveka liu lopfuula,
Kondwerani ndapezayo.
Angelo a Mlungu nayankha.
Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.
Ambuye napeza nkhosayo.

title: 250 - Chimo Musalole
content:
250 - Chimo Musalole

YIELD NOT TO TEMPTATION

1. Chimo musalole, Limacimwitsa,
Gonjetso limodzi Libweza wina;
Pitani m’tsogolo, Zoipa leka,
Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

CHORUS:
Funsa Mbuye thandizo
Aszakusunga iwe;
Ali wolola Iye;
Adzasunga iwe.

 2. Thawani oipa, Ndi otukwana,
Lemekeza Mlungu, Osamamnyoza;
Khala waulemu, Ndi wacifuno,
Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

3. Kwa wolakikayo, Korona ’patsa,
Mwa cigonjetsoco, Kwa opirira;
Mpulumutsi wathu, Adzalimbitsa,
Yang’ana kwa Yesu, Adzakusunga.

title: 251 - Kulira Sikanthu
content:
251 - Kulira Sikanthu

WEEPING WILL NOT SAVE US

1. Kulira sikanthu  Ngakhale nkhope igwe,
Singaletse matsoka, Singatsuke machismo 
Kulira sikanthu.

CHORUS:
Yesu nafa pa mtanda, Yesu nandiferatu,
Yesu andilindira Kundi pulumutsa.

2. Nchitonso sikanthu  Ngakhale ikometse
Maganizo oyera, Sangandikonzetsenso 
Nchitonso sikanthu.

3. Kudikira sikanthu  Ndigona wotayika
Ndimva kuitanantu; Kudika ndifa cabe 
Kudika sikanthu.

4. Yesu Mpulumutsi Amene nandifera,
Ndikhulupira Inu, Mundipulumutsenso 
Mundipulumutsa.

title: 252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera
content:
252 - Wocimwa Iwe, Bwera

COME EVERY SOUL BY SIN OPPRESSED

1. Wocimwa iwe, bweratu, Kwa Yesu, Mbuyeyo;
Atero Iye, pumatu, Umvere mauwo.

CHORUS:
Khulupira mau ace onse a Mbuyathuyo,
Uli nawo pakumvera, Inde, moyowo.

2. Ambuye Yesu anatsira Mwazi wace pyu,
Timira m’mwazi womwewo, iyerayera mbu.

3. Wa moyo ndiye Yesudi, Zoona zacezo,
Akhalal iye njiratu yofika mmwambamo.

4. Tiyeni tonse, tinkeko, Ulendo wathuwo,
Ku dziko lace mmambamo, ’Dzakhale nayeko.

title: 253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli
content:
253 - Mbusa wa Israyeli

HE CALLS HIS LAMBS
1. Mbusa wa a Israyeli, Wocititsa cidwi;
Imva aitana nkhosa Adzatifukate!

2. Akaitana zimadza, Satonza maina;
Amazidalitsa zonse, Mwinu wa angelo.

3. Tibwera nazo kwa Inu, Tikupatsirani,
Ife tiri anu omwe, Ana’thu ndi anu.

title: 254 - Dzina La Yehova
content:
254 - Dzina La Yehova

PRAISE YE JOHAVAH’S NAME

1. Dzina la Yehova, Liyamikidwetu, tilopa;
Kumwamba-mwambako, Cikondi coposa,
Konseko kumveka Mphamvu yace.

2. Lipenga limveke Lacigonjetsoco, konse konse;
Mngoli ukhalepo; Alimba abwino;
Amveke ponsepo, omtamanda.

3. Poyimba mokweza, Kungani zingwezo, zotengana!
Atipatsa mpweya; Mpweya wodzazatu,
Ufulu wacewo, Tiyamike.

title: 255 - Ndikusowani Yesu
content:
255 - Ndikusowani Yesu

I NEED THEE PRECIOUS JESUS

1. Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndiri waumphawi;
Mlendo wopanda malo, Za dziko ndilibe.
A Yesu Mudnikonde, Mundicingamire,
Ndikunditsogolera, Mphamvu yanga ndinu.

2. Ndisowa Mtima wanu, Kudziwa nkhawazo,
Ndi mayesero anga, Ndi zacisonizo.
Nsowa Mzimu Woyera, Womandiphunzitsa,
Kundiuzane Yesu, Ndi Mwana wa nkhosa.

3. Ndikusowani Yesu, Ndionane nanu,
Mu uta-wa-lezamo, Pa cimpando canu.
Ndi ogulidwa m’mazi, Ndikakondwerere
Nyimbo zosadukiza, Ndikumpenyetsetsa.

Amen.

title: 256 - Mulungu Munathangata
content:
256 - Mulungu Munathangata

OUR HELP IN ACES PAST

1. Mulungu munathangata, Mudzathangathabe;
Woticinjiriza mz’opsa, Kwanu mutifitse!

2. Mwa mthunzi wa mpando wanu, Ndimo tibisala
Dzanja lanu liposadi, Tiri mosunguka.

3. Dziko linakhazikidwa Mapiri naima,
Mulungu wosamariza, Zako zosathera

4. Zaka ngati usiku, M’mawa kusanace.

title: 257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe
content:
257 - Olimba Ngati Thanthwe

FIRM AS A ROCK

1. Mapiri sagwedezeka, Ifenso comweco;
Olimba gwa ngati thanthwe; Ace a Yehova.

2. Phiri ndi khoma kulibe, Lofanana naye;
Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.

3. Khulukirani anu, kwa zolakwa zao zonse,
Mutithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo
content:
258 - Chikhulupiriro Cimodzi Ca Moyo

ONE LIVING FAITH

1. Lamulo la Mulunguli, Sicinthu copanda pace;
Ndi lokhalitsa myayadi, Simau cabe, ndi moyo.

2. Lamulo lanu loyera, Mutikhulukirefe,
Langwiro mwa ilo lokha, Akunja sangalione.

3. Khululukirani anu, Kwa zolakwa zao zonse,
Mithithandize kusunga Malamulowo angwiro.

title: 259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?
content:
259 - Tidzakomana Kodi?

SHALL WE MEET?

1. Tidzakomana patsidya, Mafunde akadzatha?
Kowala kosalekeza, Kulibe cisoninso?

CHORUS:
Tidzakomanako? Tidzakomane patsidya?
Tikakomane patsidya, Mabvuto akadzatha?

2. Tikakomana padoko, Akadzatha mabvuto?
Tidzaiponya nangula Pagombe lokomalo?

3. Tikakomana m’mudzimo; Nyumba zonyezimira,
Makomanso nga yasipi, omangidwa ndi Mbuye?

4. Tikakomana ndi Yesu Potenga anthu ace;
Ubwino tidzaudziwa Ntakhala mu mpando’ce.

title: 260 - Dambo La Byula
content:
260 - Dambo La Byula

VALE OF BEULAH

1. Ndipitira kunsi kwa dambo la cipululu,
Liri dambo lokongola lochedwa la Byula
Koma ndapezanso monse momera maluwa,
Mpulumutsi mwini wace ayenda ndi ine.

2. Palibe mthunzi wotsiriza panjira panga,
Kuunika kwa ulemerero kuwalitsa;
Am’mwamba andiyimbira nyimbo zokongola,
Apokolezana bwino kundicingamira.

3. Ndiri kunka ndi nsangala ku mzinda wowala,
Nsangalazo ziwalitsa njira tsiku ntsiku;
Ndasendeza zipata za mzinda wakuwala
Khwalalalo lindifitsa mzinda wa cikondi.

title: 261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene
content:
261 - Dambo Lokongola La Edene

BEAUTIFUL VALLEY OF EDEN

1. Dambo labwino Edene, Muli bata msana;
Mitima ya otopabe Ipuma nicira.

CHORUS:
Dambo labwino Edene, Kwao kwa odala,
Ndazunzikadi ndi mabvuto, Ndidzatu ndidzapume.

2. Mtima wosowa woliraa, Ndzapeza mwayi,
Nuimba nyimbo nda’ngelo, Akutaritari.

3. Ali kwao Mpulumutsi; Ndi oomboledwa
Dziko la ulemerero, Imvani nyimboyo.

title: 262 - Kristuu Kapena Barab
content:
262 - Kristuu Kapena Baraba

CHRIST OR BARABAS

1. Nditani naye Yesu? Waima panoyu
Wabvala cinyong’onyo, Ndi minga pamutu.

CHORUS:
Tsopano ndifunse, Muyankha cotani?
Ndimpacike Mfumu Yesu, Atsale Baraba?

2. Ndimasule mbalayi, Cimunthu ca dama?
Wocimwa, ngosacimwa? Mukanapo yani?

3. Funsotu loopsali! Litengeni bwino,
Nsisi zilindirabe, Koma mwa mabvuto.

4. Mpando waciweruzo sungakane dziko?
Anapfuula "Cotsa, Mumpacike Yesu!"

5. Si kwa ocimwa okha Funso linenetse;
Mvani Akristu nomwe, Ora loyesedwa

title: 263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye
content:
263 - Mvani Mau A Ambuye

HEAR THE WORDS OF SCRIPTURE

1. ’Mvani mau a Ambuye wathuyo
Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Perekani ndi mitima yanuyo,
Mulandire madalitso.

CHORUS:
Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Mndidyese ’ne, eti Mbuyeyo.
Ndizakupatsa madalitso,
Ndipo mudzasowa nawotu malo.

2. Mukufuna kodi mphamvu yaceyo?
Mudze nazo zacikhuumi m’nkhokwe
’Dzanitu cifupi ndi Ambuyeyo,
Polandira madalitso.

3. Muli nako kanthu ndi Ambuye ko?
Mudze nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Mudze nazo monga mwa lonjezo ’ce,
Ndipo mudzadalitsidwa.

4. Yamikani Mbuye pompemphera ’Ye,
Podza nazo zacikhumi m’nkhokwe,
Khulupirirani mau acewo,
Ndi kumuthokoza Iye.

5. Yimbirani ndi cimwemwe nyimbozo,
Mutabwera nazo zacikhumi,
Tipfuule mokondwera tonsefe,
Ka’mba tinadalitsidwa.

title: 264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo
content:
264 - Paciyambi Mlunguyo

HOLY DAY, JEHOVAH’S REST

1. Paciyambi Mulunguyo Analenga dzikoli,
Tsono ’napumuladi Lacisanu nciwiri.

CHORUS:
Tikondwera, tikondwera
Tikondwera podza pa Tsiku la Sabatalo.

2. Mlungu ’napatulanso Tsiku lakupumalo.
’Nalipatsa kwa ife Ndi Sabata lacelo.

3. Anthu ace kalelo Anasunga tsikulo,
Ndi pobwera Yesuyo Iye anasunganso.

4. Osanthula m’bukumo, Akuona kutitu
Mlungu sanasinthei, Tsiku ndace lomweli.

5. Ndipo ati m’bukumo Podzabwera Yesuyo
Anthu adzasungabe Tsiku la Sabatalo.

title: 265 - Mtenderewo
content:
265 - Mtenderewo

PEACE, PERFECT PEACE

1. Mtenderewo, m’dziko la mdimali;
Mwazi wa Yesu unong’oneza.

2. Mtenderewo, m’ntchito zocuruka;
Ntchito ya Yesu ndiko kupuma.

3. Mtenderewo, m’bvuto lotizinga;
Mtendere uli mwa Yesu yekha.

4. Mtenderewo, anga ali m’tari
Yesu asunga ine ndi iwo.

5. Mtenderewo, uli m’tsogolomo;
Tidziwa Yesu ali pa mpando.

content:
266 - tNdidzakutsatani

Ndikutsatani, ndikutsatani,

267 - Fesa Mbeuu Za Cikondi

SCATTER SEEDS OF KINDNESS

Tipeze zokondweretsa M’madalitso a lero,

CHORUS:
Ufese zacifundo, Ufese zacifundo

2. Sitisamala maluwa Ndi mbalame poyimba,

Dzuwa sitisamala Pa nthawi ya cilimwe,
Akafikanso mazizi Nthaawiyo tilifuna.

3. Mwana akacita ngozi Poswa cikho comwera
Kodi mukalipa ko’psa Poturutsa tsinyalo?
Mukudziwa kuti mawa Adzakhala wakufa,
Kodi pakukwiya naye Mupsa Mtima leroli?

4. Poganizira za m’mbuyo Za zomwe tinacita,

Ndi nchito zosaganiza; Izi zitikumbutsa

title: 268 - Bata Ndu!
content:
268 - Bata Ndu!

PEACE STILL

1. Mbuye, Nyanja yakalipa, Mafunde akweretsa!

Kodi simukusamala, Mugoneranjiko?
Pamene ife tiri ndi mantha, Kodi tifere m’madzi?

CHORUS:
Namondweyo andimvera Ine, bata ndu! (Bata ndu!)
Ngakhale Nyanja zikalipe,
Ziwanda, anthu, ngakhale zinazo,
Madzi sangamize bwato Mwini
Nyanja ndi mtunda ali momwemo;
Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batu ndu, bata ndu!
Zonse zingondimvera Ine; Batadi ndu!

2. Mbuye bvuto mu mtimamu Landibvuta leroli;
Kucirimika konse kwatha; Ndipulumutsenitu
Nkhwenkhwe ya chimo yozunza, Inditsirizitsa;
Ndamuka ine, ndamuka, Mbuye! Dzandipulumutseni.

3. Mbuye zobvutazo zatha, Kwagwa bata tsopano,
Kwawalal ngati kalirole, Ngati ndiri Kumwamba;
Msandisiyenso Ambuye, Tikhale Pamodzi;
Ndikafike ku gombe lodala, Mukandipumulitse.

title: 269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu
content:
269 - Mpulumutsi Wozizwitsa ndi Yesu

A WONDERFUL SAVIOUR IS JESUS
1. Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa ndi Yesu,
Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa,

Ndiona zokondweretsa.

CHORUS:
Andibisira moyo wanga m’thanthwe,
Abisira moyo wanga louma;
Abisira aphimba dziko louma;
Moyo wanga aika pobisika,
An’phimba ndi dzanja lace.
An’phimba ndi dzanja lace.

2. Mpulumutsi wozizwitsa ndi Yesu
Anditulira Katundu,
Andicirikiza sindidzasowa,
Wondipatsa mphamvu ndiye.

3. Apatsa madalitso ocuruka,
An’dzanso umulungu,
Ndiyimba mokondwa ndilemekeza

4. Ndikabvekedwa zowala ndiyera,
Kukomana naye m’mwamba,
Ndapulumukadi, m’cikondi cace
N’dzafuula ndi anzanga.

title: 270 - Nkhoswe Yathu
content:
270 - Nkhoswe Yathu

1. Mpulumutsi potsazika, Ndi mau okonda,

4. Ukoma wonse ndi wace, Cigonjetso conce,

5. Mzimu wanu waciyero, Mtimvere nsisitu;
Mukhale m’mtima mwathu, Ana ace.

title: 271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru
content:
271 - Nkana Chimo Nlalikuru

THO’ YOUR SINS BE AS SCARLET

1. Nkana chimo nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe;
Nkana chino nlikuru, lingakanganulidwe;
Nkana chimo ngori’ra, ayeretsedwa;
Nkana chimo nlikuru, Nkana chimo nlikuru,
Lingakanganulidwe; Lingakanganulidwe.

2. Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo;"
Imva liu lipempha, "Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."
Ali ndi nsisi zambiri, ndi cikondico.
Imva liu lipempha, Imva liu lipempha,
"Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo: Bweranso kwa Mlunguyo."

3. Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso;
Akukhululukira, sadzakumbukiranso;
"Ndiyang’aneni anthuni," ati Mbuyeyo
Akukhululukira, Akukhulukira,
Sadzakumbukiranso, Sadzakumbukiranso.

title: 272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo
content:
272 - Ponya Cingwe Ca Moyo

THROW OUT THE LIFE-LINE

1. Pabvuta pa Nyanja, ponya cingwe,

Mbale wa mnzathu, ndani angathe
Kuponya cingweco, kumpulumutsa.

CHORUS:
Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo!
Alikunka ndi madzi!
Ponya cingweco! Cingwe ca moyo!
Wina amira lero.

2. Ponya cingweco mofulumira;
Ucedweranji ndi kujejema?
Ana amira, fulumiratu,
Ukampumulutse msanga, msangatu.

3. Ponya anthuwo azunzikatu,
Atatha koopsa sungafike;
Mphepo zabvuto ndi za matsoka.
Msanga ziwatsitsa kwakuya kwa bi.

4. Nyengo yowapulumutsa itha,
Atifera posacedwea pano;
Kangaza mbale usacedwetse,
Ingoponya cingwe apulumuke.

title: 273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu
content:
273 - Tsamira Pa Manja A Yesu

LEAN ON HIS ARMS

1. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Akuthangate athagata;
Ukamkhulupira ndithu, Adzakusangalatsa.

CHORUS (Sap. & Tenor):

3. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, ’Dzakusamala, kusamala!
Katundu wolemeretsa Mpereke kwa Ambuye.

4. Tsamira pa manja a Yesu, Msiyire zonse, zonsezodi!
Mtima wace ngwacikondi, Maso ace sasinza.

title: 274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye
content:
274 - Ndiri Ndi Mbuye

Pano andiyang’anira mwacifundo,
Ndifunatu akhale wa inunso!

CHORUS:
Ndipempherera’nu, Ndipempherera’nu,

Tauzatu ena za mtendererewo

Mtendere ndifuna mulandirenso!

Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!
Udzakhala kuti nthawi zosatha!

2. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Kosatha n’kuti?
Ndi oomboledwa? Ndi otaika?
Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Mbali izi njiti - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"

3. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Uchitiranji
Zokondwa za dziko mosaganiza?
Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Popanda kusankha - "Kosatha n’kuti?

4. "Kosatha! N’kuti?" Bwenzi samala;
Adzaweruzatu Mulungu msanga
Lero linganene - "kosatha! N’kuti?"
Lero linganene - "Kosatha! N’kuti?

Bwenzi usagone, lekana m’dziko,
Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N’kuti?"
Mpaka utayankha - "Kosatha! N ’kuti.

Atenga inetu, atenga inetu.
Tsiku linalo adzabweranso, Kutenga inetu.

Aliluya! Aliluya! Aliluya! Amen.

title: 283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?
content:
283 - Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?

SHALL YOU? SHALL I?

1. Wina adzalowa pakhomo, Msanga posacedwa,
Adzadya za ulemelero, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine?
Podzakondwerera kosatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi Ndine?
Wina adzayenda m’miseu, Nadzakhalandi masomphenya.

2. Wina adzatula katundu, Msanga Posacedwa
Nadzalandiratu korona, Kodi ndiwe? Kondi ndine?
Wina adzaonatu Mfumu, Atamasuka ku zadziko,
Nadzakondwa naye k osatha; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

3. Wina ’dzagogoda citseko, Msanga Posacedwa
Nadzamvatu, Sindikudziwa, Kodi Ndiwe? Kodi ndine?
Poitana sadzamu yankha, Citseko citatsekedwatu,
Ndipo sadzalandira mphotho; Kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

4. Wina adzaimbatu nyimbo, Msanga posacedwa
Pamodzi ndi owomboledwa, Kodi ndiwe, kodi ndine?
Wina adzakakondwerera, Ndi okondedwa pa dookolo,
Ataomboledwa kosatha; kodi ndiwe? Kodi ndine?

title: 284 - Popita Masikuwa

284 - Popita Masikuwa

1. Kuli anthu obvutika, Popita masikuwa,
Kuli anthu akutopa, Popita masikuwa;

3. Zotimanga tizisiya, Popita masikuwa;
Modzi ndi mmodzi atsala, Popita masikuwa
Zabwino tidzakhala, ponse ponse zimera;
Tidzakhala okondwa, Popita masikuwa.

title: 285 - Alipo Malo Opuma
content:
285 - Alipo Malo Opuma

3. Alipo malo okwana, Mfupi ndi Mulungu;
Chimwemwe ndi mtenderewo, Mfupi ndi Mulungu

286 - Nditengeni

1. Ndifuna kuona nthawi Yonkha ku Ziyoni,Komwe tidzakhala bwino, Ku mudzi wa Yesu.

Nditengeni tengeni, Ku Ziyoni

4. Ndifuna ku Yerusalemu, Ku mudzi wa Mfumu,

title: 287 - M’Mayesoro Anga

287 - M’Mayesoro Anga

Pondenguma ine, Kumbukireni,

2. Za dziko nzacabe, Ndisatengeke

Kusunga kwani sisi, Ndikubvomera

3. Matsoka si anu, Zolabadira;
Zowawa zikadza Kusokonzeza;
Zikumphanitu Ndisacimwe bi;
Nkhawa zanga zonse, Ndikupatsani.

title: 289 - Mundilandiretu

289 - Mundilandiretu

Ndipulumutseni nokha, Mundilandiretu.

4. Ndigwadira nsisi zanu, Ndioneni Ambuyanga;
Yayambidwa ntchito yanu Mundilandiretu.

title: 290 - TIkondwera Pakugwira Ntchito
content:
290 - TIkondwera Pakugwira Ntchito

GLADLY, GLADLY, TOILING FOR THE MASTER

1. Tikondwera pakugwira ntchito ya Ambuye mofunitsatu
Yomwe mbuye wathu watipatsa, Tidzacita molimbikatu

CHORUS:
Pogwira nchito, Timakondatu, timakondwatu
Pogwira ntchito, m’munda wa Ambuyeyo.

(Tenor and Bass)
Pakugwira ntchito yace, timakondwatu, E, timakondwatu,
Pakugwira ntchito yace m’munda wa Ambuyeyo

2. Mokondwra tidzanena nthano ya cikondi cace m’dzikoli
Mu ulemerero wa Atate at ipatsa madalitso ’ce

3. Pomtsatira Mbuye wathu Yesu, Pakuyenda naye m’njiramo,
Tidzatsogolera otaika, kuti anke kwa Ambuyeyo.

title: 291 - Ayenera Yesuyo
content:
291 - Ayenera Yesuyo

WORTHY IS THE LAME

1. Ayenera Yesuyo, Ayenera Yesuyo,
Ayenera Yesuyo, Wophedwa.

CHORUS:
Yimba Aliluya! Tama aliluya!
’Lenu aliluya! Wophedwa!

2. Mpulumutsi idzani, Wonongani ucimo,
Zaka cikwi zifike, Yesuyo

3. Timve conco m’mtimamu, Kumyamika, kumkonda,
Mpaka tilowe m’Mwamba Kum’wamba.

title: 292 - Timanja Tiwiri
content:
292 - Timanja Tiwiri

TWO LITTLE HANDS

1. Timanja tigwire ntchito yace, Lilime limlemekeze,
Makuatu amve mau ace, Mau ayimbetu nyimbo

CHORUS:
Tidzatu, Ambuye, Tidzatu tikali ana,
Tidzatu, Ambuye, Kumva za Inu.

 2. Timapazi tiyende m’njirayo, Yopita nayo kumwamba;
Timaso tiwerenge Bible, Linena cikondi cace.

3. Kamtima ndipereke kwa Yesu, Apulumutse moyowu
Kuti ndigwire ntchitoyace, Ndikhaletu wace konse.

title: 293 - Agogoda Ndaniyo
content:
293 - Agogoda Ndaniyo

KNOCKING, KNOCKING

1. Agogoda ndaniyo?
Alindira, Abwino!
Ndiye mlendo wacifundo,
Wina palibe mnzace,
Ine ndiri wozizwadi
Nditsegulire khomo;
Nditsegulire khomo.

2. Agogoda pompobe
Alindira, Abwino!
Citseko cilimbiranji
Zitsotso zomelera
Zomatirira zakuda,
Zomamatira zonse,
Zomamatira zonse,

3. Agogoda catani?
Alindira Abwino;
Indetu agogodabe
Ndi cisoti ca minga
Mpulumutsi alindabe,
Kodi sungamlowetse;
Kodi sungamlowetse?

title: 294 - Yang’ana Yesu
content:
294 - Yang’ana Yesu

COVER WITH HIS LIFE

1. Yang’ana Yesu wosacimwa; Tate wampatsa moyo wace,
Moyo wa imfa, ndi wa tsoka, Wandibveka ndi moyo wace,

CHORUS:
Moyo wacewu, Woyeretsa; Ine ndadziwa moyo wace;
Moyo wa tsoka ndi wa imfa Moyo wangwiro ndabvekedwa

2. Zocimwa zanga zinampweteka, Chimo nloopsa lofiira,
Mundibvundikire Inu Yesu, Ndipulumuke ciweruzo!

3. Ndilakalaka akhululuke Yesu ambveke zoyera;
Ndatembenuka zanga ntaya, Ndalandiridwa mokondwera.

4. Ndayanjanadi ndi Mulungu, Ndayesedwatu wolungama;
Ndayeretsedwa ndi mauwo Ndalemerera mwa Ambuye.

title: 295 - Mema Nkhondo
content:
295 - Mema Nkhondo

SOUND OF THE BATTLE CRY

1. Mema nkhondoyo, wadza mdaniyo,
Kweza mbendera ya Mbuye.
Konza zidazo, yimba nyimboyo,
Khazikikatu pa Mulungu.

CHORUS:
Haya! ’nzathu, itilinda nkhondo,
Limbatu, nkhondo nja Yesu
Musafoke, m’thyole linga lao,
Mbuye ndi kazembe wathuyo.

2. M’lake mdaniyo, m’yimbe m’njiramo,
Mpaka nkhondoyo ileka
Zida bvalani, mantha tayani,
Pitikitsani adaniwo.

3. Mlungu, muvefe, m’patse mphamvuyo,
M’tithandizetu, tipempha
Nkhondo itatha, titagonjetsa,
Mutipatse krona wa moyo.

title: 296 - Munditsogolere Mbuye
content:
296 - Munditsogolere Mbuye

LEAD ME, SAVIOUR

1. Mbuye, tsogolereni, Bwino, bwino panjira;
Ndipezemo mtendere, Ndidzakhala wokondwa
Mkatsogola ndiopa kuatika (Mbuye)
Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Mbuye),

2. Thanthwe langa ndi Inu, Ndikabvutika m’moyo;
Mukakhala pafupi, sindimaopa kanthu
Mkatsogola, ndiopa kutaika (Mbuye),
Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Ambuye),

3. Mtsogole mpaka komwe, Kudzathera zobvuta
Dzikola la usana, Misozi adzacotsa
Mkatsogola, Ndiopa kutaika (Mbuye)
Poti moyo uzunza (zunza), Tsogolereni Mbuye (Ambuye)

title: 297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda
content:
297 - Macimo Atsala Pa Mtanda

NAILED TO THE CROSS

1. Mmodzi nalola kufa m’malo mwa ine,
Wosayenera’ne ndikhale,
Njira yopita ku mtanda anayenda
Anandikhululukiradi.

CHORUS:
Zocimwa pa mtanda, Zocimwa pa mtanda,
Anapirira koposadi! Nasauka nafa,
Pa mtandapo Yesu! Anasenza macimo anga.

2. Wondikonda inetu, wacifundoyo,
Potsuka Mtima wanga woda,
Ndiribenso mulandu ndamasulidwa,
Macimo atsala pa mtanda.

3. Mpulumutsi tsiku ndi tsiku,
Nyimbo iri pakamwa ndi mu mtimanso,
Kuti macimo acotsedwa.

title: 298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu
content:
298 - Ndiribe Zanga, Zonse Nzanu

NONE OF SELF AND ALL OF THEE

1. Ndinali nayotu nthawi Yowawa yacisoni,
Ndinauza Yesu "Zonse nzanga ndiribe zanu,"
Ine ndiribe canu Ine ndiribe canu,
Monyada ndinati "Zonse nzanga ndiribe canu."

2. Nandipeza, ndinamwona pa mtanda wopwetekwa
Mtimabe unati, "zina n’zangatu zina n’zanu".
Zina n’zanga ndi zanu, Zina n’zanga ndi zanu,
Mtimabe unati "Zina n’zanga zina ndi zanu."

3. Tsiku ndi tsiku cifundo cace cinanditsitsa,
Ndipo ndinati, "Ndicepe ndithu mukule Inu."
Ndicepe ine ndithu, mukule Inu Mbuye,
Ndipo ndinatu, "Ndicepe ndithu, mukule Inu."

4. Cokwera kuposa myamba, Kuya kuposa Nyanja
Cikondi canu caposa Tiribe kanthu n’zanu
Ndiribe zanga, Ndiribe zanga n’zanu.
Cikondi canu coposa, "Tiribe kanthu n’zanu"

title: 299 - Tikondwere Nthawi Zonse
content:
299 - Tikondwere Nthawi Zonse

ALWAYS CHEERFUL

1. Tikondwere nthawi zonse; Tidandauliranji
Kwina "Tate wathu Mlungu, Atisamalirafe?

CHORUS:
Tikondwere nthawi zonse Ponse dzuwa liwala
Njira ya ntchitoyi ndi yokoma
Tikondwere konseko.

2. Dzanja lace litsogoza, Ngati chimo lidzatu
Nsisi zace, Satisiya tokha bi.

3. Tikaleka ntchito yathu, Tidzacita macimo,
Ndipo mtambo wa cisoni, Udzaletsa cimwemwe.

4. Abwinowo akondwere, Ndi mtendere wosatha
Timveretu mau ace, Tikonde zokomazo.

title: 300 - Mpumulo Kwa Otopa
content:
300 - Mpumulo Kwa Otopa

REST FOR THE WEARY

1. Kwao Mkristu kwa ulemu, Ndi malo a mpumulo;
Mpulumutsi anapita komwe Mtima ufuna

CHORUS:
Mpumulo kwa otopa, Mpumulo kwa otopa,
Mpumulo kwa otopa; Mukapumadi;
Patsidya pa Yordano, M’minda ya Edeneyo
Muli mtengo wa moyo, Mukapumadi.

2. Akundimangira nyumba  Idzakhala muyaya
Ndidzakhalitsatu uko, M’dzikolo la cimwemwe.

3. Zowawa sizidzalowa, Cisoni kulibenso;
Koma m’kati mwa mtendere, Ndidzabvala korona

4. Imfa idzamarizidwa, Tsoka lidzacotsedwa;
Adzapfuula mokondwa Pa tsiku la mdzukiro

5. Yimbani olowa m’Mwamba, Yimbani cigonjetso,
Mukadzalowa m’ziyoni, Khoma mudzaliona.

title: 301 - Ambuye Ali Pafupi Kudza
content:
301 - Ambuye Ali Pafupi Kudza

’TIS ALOMOST TIME FOR THE LORD TO COME

1. Ambuye ali pafupi kudza, Ndikumvaconcodi,
Ndiponso nyenyezi zikuzima, Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu

CHORUS:
Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!
Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kuca ndithu!
Usiku wathadi! Usana wadzanso.
Ee! Tsopano ndi mbanda kucatu!

 2. Zizindikiro za mlengalenga Zilalikiradi;
Ndi za pa dziko zinena kuti Ambuye wayandikira

3. Ndi nthawi yoti kunyada kuthu Mu mpingo wonsewo;
Ukhale wofulumira ntchito, Ukhale woyang’aniratu

4. Pitani msanga kukalalika Kwa osaukawo;
Ndi kwa omveka a dziko lino; Onsewo afulumirenso.

title: 302 - Mulungu Wa Kumwamba
content:
302 - Mulungu Wa Kumwamba

(Upon Dedicating a Church)

1. Mulungu wa kumwamba, tabwera kunoku,
Ndi Mtima wokondwera kulowa m’nyumbayi
Cifukwa ca zabwino mwacitazi
Titokuyamikirani leroli.

CHORUS:
Inde tikuyamikani, Atate, leroli,
Mwatimangira ’fe kuno kacisi wanuyu!
Ndi ulemerero wanu mudzadze m’mnyumbayi;
Muyeretse, mudalitse, munomu

2. Tikondwa tonse kukuthokozani ’Nu
Poyamba kupemphera ndi kuyimbiramu
Mom’muno nsiku zonse mukhale nafetu
Monga nd angelo anu m’mwambamo.

3. Ikhale ngati nyali, yowala m’nyumbayi,
Yakutsogoza onse opunthwa m’mdima bii,
Akunja ndi Akhristu mwapulumutse ndi kuunika koturuka munomu.

title: 303 - Kale Anthu M’kholamo
content:
303 - Kale Anthu M’kholamo

WHO IS HE IN YONDER STALL?

1. Kale anthu m’kholamo, Napembedza Mwanayo

CHORUS:
Ndiye Mbuye, Mfuma yanga, Ndiye Mbuye, wakumwamba,
Amgwadire anthuwo, Timtamande Mfumuyo.

2. Wosauka Iyedi, Anagwira ntchitozi.

3. Ndani kodi munthuyo, Woyesedwa m’bwinjamo?

4. Analira ndaniyo, Pomwalira bwenzilo?

5. M’munda muna ndaniyo, Mwazi wace dotho do?

6. Iye ndani m’ndamo, Anafera ’daniwo?

7. Mkuca wace ndaniyo, Waturuka m’mandamo?

8. Ndani alikudzako, Mponda wakuyeramo?

title: 304 - Atate Wa Kumwambako
content:
304 - Atate Wa Kumwambako

FATHER, SON, AND SPIRIT

1. Atate wa kumwambako, Munaombla ife ndi
Cikondi canu cijaco, Tiyamikira inutu.

2. Ambuye Yesu ndinutu, Munabadwira anthu ’fe
Munatifera tonse fe, Tiyamikira Inutu

3. Mzimu woyera m’timamo, Tiyeretsedwe ndinunso,
Munatisunga bwinoli, Tiyamikira Inutu.

4. Atate, Mwana, Mzimunso, Ndinu atatu mmodzitu,
Ocimwa tinipemphhako, Mutikhululukire ’fe.

title: 305 - Dzuwa Lapita
content:
305 - Dzuwa Lapita

THE SUN HAS SET

1. Dzuwa lapita, Dzuwa lapita,
Mlungu mutigonetswe phe!

2. Mdima wafika, mdima wafika,
Mutisunge tonse bwino.

3. Tibvomereze, tibvomereze,
Zakucimwa zathu zonse.

4. Mkhululukire, mkhululukire,
Zoipazi zathu zonse.

5. Lero tigone lero tigone
Tigonemo mu mtendere

6. Ndife ananu, Ndife ananu,
"Tate Mlungu wotikonda.

title: 306 - Yesu Adzaweruzatu
content:
306 - Yesu Adzaweruzatu

BEFORE JEHOVA’S AWFUL THRONE

1. Yesu adzaweruzatu Pomwe liwala dzuwapo
Wace ufumu ukhala Mpaka ku nthawi zonsezo

2. Anthu m’mitundu yonseyo Adzayimbira dzinalo
Ndi ana onse ayimba, Hosana kwa Mulunguyo

3. Kwa Iye apempheratu Kulemekeza Mbuyeyo
Ndi dzina lace likwera Mongatu nsembe mmwambamo

4. Ndi anthu onse pansipo Alemekeze Mfumuyo,
Ndipo angelo ayimba, Ayankhe onsewo, Amen.

title: 307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo
content:
307 - Munthu Wa Zisoniyo

MAN OF SORROWS

1. Munthu wa zisoniyo, Timcha dzina lacelo,
Mpulumutsi dzinanso, Aleluya, Ndinu Yesu.

2. Anapeputsidwako, Nandifera m’mtandamo
Anandiombolayo, Aleluya, ndinu Yesu.

3. Anapacikidwatu, Natha nchito yace myu!
Anakwera mmwamba du! Aleluya, ndinu Yesu

4. Adzabwera Iyenso, Kudzatenga acewo
Nyimbo tidzayimbanso, Aleluya, Ndinu Yesu.

title: 308 - Polenga Dzikoli
content:
308 - Polenga Dzikoli

LET THERE BE LIGHT

1. Polenga dzikoli, Pakumva Inudi, Kwayeratu;
Mumve pemperoli, Ndipo pamenepa, Palibe mauwo, Muwaletu.

2. Inu wakudzatu Kuwaciritsadi A nthendawo;
Kupatsa moyowo, Kuona m’masomo, pa anthu onsewo, Muwaletu.

3. Mzimu woonadi, Ndi wa cikondico, Idzanitu
Mwamba mulengemo, Pali za mdimazo, Pa dziko ponsepo, Muwaletu

4. Inu Atatuwo, Wodala Mlunguyo, Timveretu,
Malengedwewo, Mdima ukhalamo, Mutume mauwo Muwaletu

title: 309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye
content:
309 - Ndiyenda Naye Yesu Mbuye

I’M WALKING EVERY DAY WITH JESUS

1. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndikondwa nthawi zonsezo
Ndipeza ciyanjano caceco, Ndikwanitsidwa ndi Iye.

CHORUS:
Ndiyende naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndifuna atsogoze ’ne
Pokagamira pa Mplumutsiyo Sinditaika konse bi

2. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndicite cifuniro ’ce.
Analonjeza kuthangata ’be, Adzakwanitsa zonsezo.

3. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndabvomereza chimolo,
Pamodzi tidzayenda konseko, Mu ciyanjano caceco.

title: 310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu
content:
310 - Ndifuna Kukhala Ndi Yesu

I WANT TO LIVE CLOSER TO JESUS

1. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kuyang’ana nkhope yace,
Adzaze mtimanga cisomo cace, Ndifuna kukhala naye.

CHORUS:
Khala pafupi, mfupi nd Yesu, Pa mbali ya Iyeyo;
Kuyang’ana pa nkhope yabwinoyo, Ndifuna kukhala naye.

2. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Kumtsata pafupifupi
Ndi kuti ndimvetse polankhula ’Ye, ponena lonjezo lace.

3. Ndifuna kukhala ndi Yesu, Pafupi masiku onse
Pogwiratu dzanja la mphamvu yace, Nkalowa m’ufumu wace.

title: 311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu
content:
311 - E, Mzimuu Wa Mulungu ’Nu

O SPIRIT OF THE LIVING GOD

1. E, Mzimu wa Mulungu, ’Nu, Mukhale m’mtimanga;
Ndi zangazo ndipatsatu Kwa Inu, Mbuyanga

CHORUS:
Mdzaze, mdzaze ’ne, Mdzaze Mzimu Woyera ’Nu,
Mdzaze, mdzaze ’ne, Wanu ndikhaletu.

2. Ndifunatu kucitadi Kufuna kwanuko;
Sin’funa kanthu kena bi, Mndidzaze, mtimamo,

3. Ndilibe kanthu kabwino, Kopatsa Inuyo;
Mutsuke Mtima wangawo, Ndi mwazi wanuwo.

title: 312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa
content:
312 - Taitanidwa Kubatizidwa

CALLED TO BE BAPTIZED

1. Tainanidwatu, Kuli mtsinje Yordano;
Ife tinamvadi Mau mcipululumo

CHORUS:
Ife tafikadi Kubatizidwamo,
Kuti titsukidwa Mphululupulu zathuzo.

2. Tamva Uthangawo, Wa cikondi caceco
Lapani m’mtimamo, Yesu ali kudzanso

3. Yesu anenanso, Yemwe akhulupira,
Nabatizidwa ’ye, Adzapulumukadi.

4. Tiyamikiratu Nsisi zace Yesuyo;
Watiturusadi Mdima wa zoipazo.

title: 313 - Pa Ubatizo
content:
313 - Pa Ubatizo
